desc: Now available on your newstand, the “Annals of the NYAS” app brings you perspectives on research of current scientific interest with far-reaching implications for the wider scientific community and society at large. Note that any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when you purchases a subscription.About the JournalAnnals of the New York Academy of Sciences is one of the oldest scientific journals in the United States and among the most cited of multidisciplinary scientific serials. Continuously published since 1823, Annals is the premier publication of the Academy, offering the proceedings of conferences sponsored by the NYAS as well as those of other scientific organizations. New ideas are frequently unveiled at conferences, and the proceedings literature, even when speculative, can provide both a window on the research activity of the moment and important insights into the future direction of research. With 30 volumes published annually by Wiley, Annals provides multidisciplinary perspectives on research of current scientific interest with far-reaching implications for the wider scientific community and society at large. Annals’ scope, although primarily focused on biomedical areas, extends into fields as diverse as astronomy, psychology, anthropology, and philosophy. Each publication assembles the best thinking of key contributors for a comprehensive treatment of a field of investigation at a time when emerging developments offer the promise of new insight. These volumes stimulate new ways to think about science by providing a neutral forum for discourse — within and across many institutions and fields. The Institute for Scientific Information ranks the Annals in the top 2% of sources cited in the scientific literature.
name: Annals of the New York Academy of Sciences

author: Bauer Vertriebs KG
desc: Das ePaper der ASTROWOCHE ist das digital aufbereitete Horoskop-Magazin, das Ihnen Woche für Woche mit vielen Lese-Zusatzfunktionen einen faszinierenden Überblick über alle astrologischen Themen bietet.Für alle, die mehr erwarten, hat die ASTROWOCHE keineswegs oberflächlich oder allgemein formulierte Voraussagen, sondern mehr Tageshoroskope, mehr Astrologie und mehr Lebensberatung. Es ist für Einsteiger wie auch Fortgeschrittene gemacht, erklärt mit Profis die Konstellation der Planeten, liefert fundierte Experten-Analysen und bietet Ihnen lebensnahe Tipps, die jeder umsetzen kann. Dazu haben wir viele Features eingebaut, die das Lesen noch komfortabler machen: Stichwortsuche, Vergrößern, und elektronisches Blättern laden zum entspannten Lesen ein. ASTROWOCHE ist auch unterhaltsame Lektüre und ein Gesundheitsratgeber für alle, die bewusst und in Harmonie mit ihrem Körper und ihrer Seele leben wollen. Das besondere Extra ist das exklusive Tarot-Orakel, das tagtäglich eine persönliche Lebensberatung und Quelle der Inspiration sein kann.Preise: Einzelausgabe für 1,99 Euro1-Monatsabonnement für 7,99 Euro1 Halbjahressabonnement für 44,99 Euro 1 Jahresabonnement für 84,99 Euro Hinweise zum In App-Abonnement: Sie haben verschiedene Möglichkeiten, Ausgaben von ASTROWOCHE zu lesen. Einzelne Ausgaben können Sie innerhalb der App über Ihr iTunes-Konto erwerben. Alternativ können Sie über Ihr iTunes-Konto ein Abonnement abschließen, wahlweise über 1 Monat, 6 Monate oder ein Jahr. Sobald Sie Ihren Kauf bestätigen, wird Ihr iTunes-Account mit dem entsprechenden Betrag belastet. Ihr Abo verlängert sich automatisch, sofern Sie die automatische Verlängerung nicht spätestens 24 Stunden vor Ende der Abolaufzeit deaktivieren. Wenn Ihr Abo sich verlängert, wird Ihr iTunes Account 24 Stunden vor Ende der Abolaufzeit belastet. Wenn Sie ein laufendes Abonnement haben, wird Ihre Kündigung erst zum Ende der Laufzeit wirksam. Um Ihr Abo zu verwalten und die automatische Verlängerung zu aktivieren oder zu deaktivieren, gehen Sie bitte unter Einstellungen auf die Option „Store“. Tippen Sie dann auf „Apple-ID“ und „Apple-ID anzeigen“. Im sich öffnenden Fenster finden Sie unter „Abos“ den Menüpunkt „Verwalten“. Für den Download der App und der Ausgaben empfehlen wir eine 3G- oder WLAN-Verbindung. Weitere Informationen: http://www.bauer-plus.de/datenschutz.jsp

desc: Philosophy Now is a magazine for everyone interested in ideas. It contains articles on all aspects of Western philosophy, as well as book reviews, letters, news, cartoons, and the occasional short story.Since its small-scale launch in Britain in 1991, Philosophy Now has grown to become the most widely-read philosophy periodical in the English language. ChemCatChem seeks to bring down the barriers between homogeneous, heterogeneous, bio- and nanocatalysis and to promote communication within and between these communities. Although primarily a clinical journal, we welcome submissions of basic science papers if the authors can demonstrate their clinical relevance.Anaesthesia has a very high immediacy factor, demonstrating the relevance of articles to the anaesthesia community, and an impact factor of 3.486 (2012).The Association of Anaesthetists of Great Britain and Ireland (AAGBI) is a professional membership organisation for anaesthetists in Great Britain and Ireland. Membership is open to those doctors practising or training in anaesthesia, or allied medical disciplines, principally intensive care and pain medicine. The Association’s motto in somno securitas (safe in sleep) encapsulates the major focus of the AAGBI: safety in anaesthesia.

Note that any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when you purchases a subscription.About the JournalAbout the Journal:The Journal of Pathology aims to serve as a translational bridge between basic biomedical science and clinical medicine with particular emphasis on, but not restricted to, tissue based studies. The main interests of the Journal lie in publishing studies that further our understanding the pathophysiological and pathogenetic mechanisms of human disease.The Journal welcomes investigative studies on human tissues, in vitro and in vivo experimental studies, and investigations based on animal models with a clear relevance to human disease, including transgenic systems. In general, hypothesis driven studies that appropriately employ multiple investigative techniques are preferred over those that rely on a single methodology.As well as original research papers, the Journal seeks to provide rapid publication in a variety of other formats, including editorials, review articles, commentaries and perspectives and other features, both contributed and solicited.About the Society:The Pathological Society of Great Britain and Ireland, is dedicated to enhancing high quality research and education in pathology in its broadest sense. The Society hosts a major conference twice a year with outstanding speakers on a range of topics from basic molecular pathology to diagnostic practice and provides a forum for investigators across the world to present their research.The Society also has a generous range of grants that it awards to its members including PhD studentships, scholarships and travel support.

author: Sprea Editori s.p.a.
desc: Il Mio Acquario, l’unica rivista italiana di acquariofilia diffusa su tutto il territorio nazionale con dodici uscite all’anno, ora è su iPad. È in edicola da oltre tredici anni (siamo arrivati al numero 160) e costituisce la bibbia di tutti gli appassionati di questo affascinante hobby, che richiede ai suoi cultori passione, perseveranza e voglia di aggiornarsi continuamente sulla biologia degli organismi acquatici e su materie tecniche (filtri, condizionatori e altri accessori sofisticati). È scritta da grandi esperti, ma non è destinata solo ad acquariofili esperti: un’intera generazione di neofiti si è “fatta le ossa” con Il mio Acquario.E' possibile acquistare le singole copie o fare un abbonamento - Abbonamento auto-rinnovabile da 1 anno, € 29,99. Per modificare le opzioni di abbonamento o per disattivarlo visita il tuo account Apple. Ad avvenuta conferma dell'acquisto, il costo verrà addebitato sul tuo account iTunes. Ricorda che l'abbonamento verrà rinnovato automaticamente tramite iTunes Store. Il costo del rinnovo verrà addebitato automaticamente entro 24 ore dallo scadere dell'abbonamento corrente. Puoi disattivare il rinnovo automatico dal tuo account Apple, esprimendo la tua scelta almeno 24 ore prima dello scadere dell'abbonamento corrente. Non puoi cancellare il tuo abbonamento corrente prima dello scadere del termine. Privacy Policy: http://www.sprea.it/privacy.html

author: Max-Planck-Gesellschaft
desc: Wissenschaft leicht gemacht: Lesen Sie die MaxPlanckForschung, das Wissenschaftsmagazin der MaxPlanckGesellschaft, jetzt kostenlos als E-Magazin auf Ihrem iPad! Das E-Magazin liefert die Geschichte hinter den Geschichten – gründlich recherchiert und verständlich geschrieben. Renommierte Wissenschaftsjournalisten sehen sich in den Instituten der Max-Planck-Gesellschaft um und schauen den Forscherinnen und Forschern über die Schulter. So erfahren Sie aus erster Hand, was die Wissenschaft heute treibt und morgen bewegt. Neben aktuellen Kurzberichten sowie den Rubriken Physik & Astronomie, Biologie & Medizin, Materie & Material, Umwelt & Klima und Kultur & Gesellschaft finden Sie in jeder Ausgabe einen Themenschwerpunkt. Die Beiträge umfassen alle Bereiche der aktuellen Grundlagenforschung – von kosmischen Objekten an den Grenzen von Raum und Zeit über ökologische und soziale Systeme bis hin zu molekularen und atomaren Strukturen, auf denen die unbelebte Welt aufbaut. Das E-Magazin der MaxPlanckForschung erscheint vier Mal jährlich – ebenso wie die englische Übersetzung MaxPlanckResearch. Mit einem Abonnement des neuen E-Magazins haben Sie ab jetzt alle Ausgaben auf Ihrem iPad mit dabei.

Independent Commentaries on matters related to articles published in Pathogens and Disease or on topics of actuality in infectious diseases are also welcome.Pathogens include all eukaryotes, prokaryotes and viruses that infect humans, including zoonotic pathogens. author: Magzter Inc.
desc: Modern Kheti, as the name indicates, relates to the modern agricultural techniques; conservative and cash crops, allied professions and farm machinery through training programs or upcoming events on a national and international level. Introduced in 1987, it is the leading and most widely read agriculture based magazine throughout Northern India. Punjab and Haryana, extensively known as the food grain basket of India, has in almost every household Modern Kheti, as it caters to every aspect of farming like growing of seasonal crops, their problems & solutions, conservative and cash crop farming. It also covers – fishery, poultry dairy, bee keeping, floriculture, horticulture etc. The main aim of Modern Kheti is to keep up the spirit of farming, bond different regions and help agriculture grow. It inspires the youth to take up agriculture as farming with a lot of emphasis on organic and profitable farming. It keeps in mind the health and prosperity of all i.e. taking mankind and nature together. It is published fortnightly in Punjabi and Hindi and covers the whole of Punjab, Haryana, Rajasthan, Himachal Pradesh, Uttaranchal etc. It is undoubtedly one of the best mediums trying to provide healthy information.Magazine Subscriptions are available for purchase inside this app. Six months subscription - $3.99 (automatically renewed until canceled)   One year subscription - $6.99 (automatically renewed until canceled)Your subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period. You can manage your subscriptions through your account settings after purchase on your device. No cancellation of the current subscription is allowed during active subscription period.

author: Europharm Management Education Ltd
desc: PharmaTimes Magazine is the only publication designed for all levels of pharmaceutical industry management and for people interested in the mechanics of the relationship between the pharma industry and healthcare systems. The monthly magazine offers original and independent, news-driven features on all aspects of the pharmaceutical and healthcare sector, from sales and marketing to clinical, pricing and reimbursement, regulatory, emerging markets, PR and human resources. A comprehensive round up of global industry and healthcare news, as well the latest developments in the agency, digital and recruitment arenas, will also help you stay ahead of the pack. This digital version of the magazine features a searchable archive dating back to 2005 (in progress), a zoom function to enable clearer reading (double-click to zoom in/out), social networking integration to share content and keep friends and social-circles up to date and an option to download each issue to your device for reading offline when you're out and about.Flip your device and read PharmaTimes Magazine as a double-page spread.For further information, visit www.pharmatimes.com.

author: Wiley
desc: The leading journal in organic synthesis and catalysis is now available on your iPad and iPhone. Advanced Synthesis & Catalysis (ASC) brings you pioneering research results from academic and industrial labs on efficient, practical, and environmentally friendly green organic synthesis. Enjoy an entirely new browsing and reading experience, and keep up to date with the most important developments in chemical research:- Stay current with the latest articles through Early View.- Be notified when a new issue is available.- Download articles and issues for offline perusal.- Save your favorite articles for quick and easy access.- Share articles with colleagues or students.- Access your subscription to ASC on your iPad (institutional subscribers require “”roaming access”" setup on Wiley Online Library).CURRENT SUBSCRIBERS to Advanced Synthesis & Catalysis can “pair” their device with their personal or institutional subscription to enjoy full access in this iPad edition.SUBSCRIBE IN THE APP: Annual Subscriptions (12 issues) for the iPad-only edition are available for $499.99 (US) per year. Note that subscriptions cannot be cancelled during the term of the subscription, but you can still turn off auto-renew to prevent automatic renewal of your subscription. Note that any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when you purchases a subscription.About the JournalAdvanced Synthesis & Catalysis (ASC) is the leading primary research journal in organic chemistry, organometallics, and catalysis for organic synthesis.The high impact of ASC can be attributed to the unique focus of the journal, which publishes significant new results from academic and industrial labs on efficient, practical, and environmentally friendly organic synthesis. While homogeneous, heterogeneous, organic, and enzyme catalysis are key technologies to achieve green synthesis, related contributions on synthesis design, reaction techniques, flow chemistry, and continuous processing, multiphase catalysis, green solvents, catalyst immobilization, and recycling, separation science, and process development are also featured in ASC.

author: Giordano Vicoli
desc: It is available the number 1/2014 of the magazine ENEA, Energia, Ambiente e Innovazione. The dossier, entirely in English, is dedicated to the theme of "biofouling" (accumulation and storage of living organisms on the hulls of boats) and the related problem of anti-fouling paints on the hulls are traditionally applied: these favor the navigation with clear environmental benefits (reduction of "biofouling" on the hull, increasing the speed of the boats and reduction of fuel consumption), but generate undesirable effects on the marine environment for their action on other marine organisms.*********************************************************The two-monthly magazine provides insights on topical scientific and technological news related to energy, technology and the environment.It is structured into the following sections:World view – The latest international news on scientific research in the fields of energy, innovation technology and the environment is provided. Whenever needed, the news is completed with additional explanations as well as all the interconnections between research and its applications, and the interpretation of the international scientific information;Focus – Specific scientific news is commented or examined; should some extraordinary event gain the national and international spotlights its technical and scientific aspects will be highlighted and studied;Close-up – A topic particularly meaningful to sustainable economic development and enterprise competitiveness is highlighted, or some controversial or complex scientific issues are examined and summarized;Outlook – Strategic issues are analyzed, particularly focusing on medium- and long-term goals, with special reference to the principal future events on the international agenda; Studies and research – It is subdivided into: Review and assessment papers: scientific reviews, and technical and scientific analyses and assessments;Research papers: articles on scientific experimental research made on site, in laboratories or through the latest observation and experimentation techniques;Technical papers: articles on the development of new technologies or new technology applications in the production sector.The final part of the magazine is devoted to synthetic “infonews” on national and international institutions, and on what national media published on scientific and technical events. A calendar of the main events scheduled on the international agenda ends the magazine.The two-monthly magazine is provided with additional monographic special issues on topical technical and scientific themes, along with the online World View real-time publication of the latest news on scientific research. Whenever needed, the news is completed with additional explanations as well as all the interconnections between research and its applications, and the interpretation of the international scientific information.
name: Energia, Ambiente e Innovazione
require: 需要 iOS 5.0 或更高版本。与 iPhone、iPad、iPod touch 兼容。 此 App 已针对 iPhone 5 进行优化。

author: Kelsey Publishing Ltd
desc: Your practical guide to cold water and tropical freshwater aquaria care. Our focus is naturally on fish but we touch on other aquatic creatures too, in fact you should find anything you may wish to keep in a home tank environment popping up in our magazine from time to time. The exceptions are marine life and outdoor pond life. We feel it best to exclude these from the regular magazine, and may look instead to produce dedicated products to cover these subjects.  -------------------- This is a free app download. Free app downloads do not include a free issue unless otherwise stated. The current issue, back issues and future issues can be purchased within the app. Subscriptions are also available within the application. When a recurring subscription is purchased the latest issue will become available to download immediately. Available subscriptions are: 2 months: UK £2.99 / US $4.99 (1 Issue)12 months: UK £16.99 / US $23.99 (6 Issues)Bundle: UK £2.99 / US $4.99 (1 Issue)- The subscription will renew automatically unless cancelled more than 24 hours before the end of the current period. You will be charged for renewal within 24 hours of the end of the current period, for the same duration and at the current subscription rate for the product. - You may turn off the auto-renewal of subscriptions through your Account Settings, however you are not able to cancel the current subscription during its active period. - Payment will charged to your iTunes account at confirmation of purchase and any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when a subscription to that publication is purchased. - Bundles of single issues can be also be bought within the application. To use purchased credits, simply click on the issue price and select ‘use credit’. This allows you to purchase back issues at reduced prices. Users can register for/ login to a pocketmags account in-app. This will protect their issues in the case of a lost device and allow browsing of purchases on multiple platforms. Existing pocketmags users can retrieve their purchases by logging into their account. We recommend loading the app for the first time in a wi-fi area so that all issue data is retrieved. If your app will not load past the splash page after a first install or an update please click the settings cog, then click Settings then Refresh app data. If this also fails to work please delete and reinstall the app from the App Store Help and frequently asked questions be accessed in-app and on pocketmags. If you have any problems at all please do not hesitate to contact us: help@pocketmags.com -------------------- You can find our privacy policy here: http://www.pocketmags.com/privacy.aspx You can find our terms and conditions here: http://www.pocketmags.com/terms.aspx

author: Wiley
desc: About the AppThe Journal of Sexual Medicine, an official journal of the International Society for Sexual Medicine (ISSM) and the International Society for the Study of Women’s Sexual Health (ISSWSH), is now available on your iPad. Fresh from the newsstand, “The JSM” brings you a stimulating, high-impact mixture of original, peer-reviewed articles concerning all aspects of basic science and clinical research in male, female, and couple’s sexual function and dysfunction. Enjoy an entirely new browsing and reading experience, and keep up to date with the most important developments in the field of sexual medicine even faster:- Stay current with the latest articles through Early View – updated almost daily.- Be notified when new issues are available.- Download articles and issues for offline perusal.- Save your favorite articles for quick and easy access.- Share articles with colleagues or students.CURRENT SUBSCRIBERS to The Journal of Sexual Medicine can “pair” their device with their personal or institutional subscription to enjoy full access in this iPad edition.SUBSCRIBE IN THE APP: Annual Subscriptions (12 issues) for the iPad-only edition are available for $499.99 (US) per year. Payment is charged to your iTunes account after confirmation of purchase. The Journal of Sexual Medicine subscriptions automatically renew within 24 hours of the end of your subscription period for $499.99 (US) unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the subscription period. To turn off auto-renew, go to your iTunes account settings after purchase. Note that subscriptions cannot be cancelled during the term of the subscription, but you can still turn off auto-renew to prevent automatic renewal of your subscription. Note that any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when you purchases a subscription.About the JournalThe Journal of Sexual Medicine (The JSM) publishes multidisciplinary basic science and clinical research to define and understand the scientific basis of male, female, and couple’s sexual function and dysfunction. An official publication of the International Society for Sexual Medicine (ISSM) and the International Society for the Study of Women’s Sexual Health (ISSWSH), The JSM is the premier, authoritative publication in the field, publishing high impact science monthly.The JSM provides healthcare professionals in sexual medicine with essential educational content and promotes the exchange of scientific information generated from experimental and clinical research in the psychologic and biologic aspects of sexual function and dysfunction. The objective of The JSM is to serve as an interdisciplinary forum to integrate the exchange among disciplines with the whole field of human sexuality. The journal succeeds this by publishing original articles, review articles, educational papers, editorials highlighting original research, and meeting information.Special topics include symposia proceedings, as well as official guidelines and other scientific and educational documents that support the mission of the ISSM and it’s five regional societies:- Asia Pacific Society for Sexual Medicine (APSSM)- European Society for Sexual Medicine (ESSM)- Sociedad Latino-Americano de Medicina Sexual (SLAMS)- Middle East Society for Sexual Medicine (MESSM)- Sexual Medicine Society of North America (SMSNA)Edited by international experts, The Journal of Sexual Medicine gives you the information to research on:- Anatomy/Physiology- Biochemistry- Couple’s Sexual Health- Endocrinology- Epidemiology- Gynecology- Intersex and Gender Identity Disorders- Men’s Sexual HealAbout the Society:The Journal of Sexual Medicine is owned by the International Society for Sexual Medicine (ISSM) and published by Wiley.

desc: Skeptical Inquirer is the official journal of the Committee for Skeptical Inquiry. On a bimonthly basis, Skeptical Inquirer publishes  critical scientific evaluations of paranormal and fringe-science claims and informed discussion of all relevant issues.According to Editor Kendrick Frazier:"Skeptical Inquirer is an unusual hybrid, part semi-popular magazine, part scientific journal. It's fair to say that we not only help to cross disciplinary barriers within scientific fields but bridge the gaps between the hard and soft sciences and between science and the general public."Skeptical Inquirer has been called a  "spokesman for rationality," serious but highly readable," "witty and informative," and a "steady buoy in the tumultuous sea of irrationality."  Its contributors have included Isaac Asimov, Martin Gardner, Carl Sagan, Stephen Jay Gould, Richard Dawkins, and hundreds of other scholars and investigators worldwide.In addition to in-depth feature articles,  special reports, up to date news and comment, book reviews and investigations on a wide variety of topics, Skeptical Inquirer has a stellar stable of regular columnists including Joe Nickell (“Investigative Files”), Massimo Polidoro (“Notes on a Strange World”), Massimo Pigluicci (“Thinking About Science”), Robert Sheaffer (“Psychic Vibrations”), and SI managing editor Benjamin Radford's reader-driven (“The Skeptical Inquiree”).-------------------- This is a free app download. Free app downloads do not include a free issue unless otherwise stated. It keeps in mind the health and prosperity of all i.e. taking mankind and nature together. author: b:dreizehn GmbH
desc: »The Analytical Scientist« is a free monthly publication on the fields of analytical chemistry, including chromatography, spectroscopy, mass spectrometry, and microscopy. We cover analytical science in part by exploring the hopes, fears, motivations and aspirations of the key figures in the field. Only through exploring why analytical scientists do what they do can we gain a full understanding of the subject. Inside each issue, you will find:  • A solutions-based approach that reflects the fact that analytical science is no longer just a series of individual techniques but a group of integrated and complementary methods.   • Coverage of the new approaches emerging at the interface of traditional techniques.   • Troubleshooting of real industry problems and case studies illustrating innovative approaches to improve performance.   • Legislation as it affects the analytical sciences.   • Business perspectives from the many industries that rely on analytical science.   • Advice aimed at senior researchers and managers in the analytical sciences, for example, how to manage your career, how to promote innovation within your team and how to run an efficient lab.   • Stories that relate analytical chemistry to real world events, for example, the Olympics, oil spills, food scares, biofuels. The Analytical Scientist is a publication for analytical scientists, not simply about analytical science. It’s fresh thinking.Additional information about The Analytical Scientist iPad app:  • Free unlimited subscription  • Use your existing log in details if you have already subscribed to the website  • In app purchases will be charged to your iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase  • To learn more about The Analytical Scientist Terms & Conditions visit: http://link.theanalyticalscientist.com/terms-conditions

Note that subscriptions cannot be cancelled during the term of the subscription, but you can still turn off auto-renew to prevent automatic renewal of your subscription. Note that any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when you purchases a subscription.About the JournalEnvironmental Toxicology and Chemistry (ET&C) is the flagship journal of the Society of Environmental Toxicology and Chemistry (SETAC). The journal is dedicated to furthering scientific knowledge and disseminating information on environmental toxicology and chemistry, including the application of these sciences to risk assessment. The journal integrates the fields of environmental toxicology; environmental, analytical, and molecular chemistry; ecology; physiology; biochemistry; microbiology; genetics; genomics; environmental engineering; chemical, environmental, and biological modeling; epidemiology; and earth sciences. ET&C publishes papers describing original experimental or theoretical work that significantly advances understanding in the area of environmental toxicology, non-chemical ecological stressors, environmental chemistry and hazard/risk assessment. This includes subjects dealing with the harmful effects of a wide range of chemical, biological and physical stressors on organisms, populations, communities and ecosystems.Editor-in-Chief: G.A. Burton, Jr.Founding Editor: C.H. Ward

author: Abannan Limited
desc: Over the last 12 years Drug Discovery World (DDW) has firmly established itself as the world's leading business review of drug discovery & development and has become a 'must read' for anybody involved in this fast changing and fundamental sector of the pharmaceutical and biopharmaceutical industry. DDW is renown for voicing the opinions of some of the Industry's leading luminaries and has become a recognised platform for them to discuss and encourage debate on some of the more challenging issues facing the drug discovery and development arena in terms of business strategy and the fundamental paradigm shifts in healthcare as a whole. DDW also examines the advances in new science and technology with a view to the commercial implications of implementing those advances and whether they can truly bring benefits to the industry as a whole and, more importantly, the discovery and development of new therapeutics.DDW is distinguishable in that it reaches out to a global audience at both bench and boardroom level allowing them to understand the new technologies and the impact they can have on their particular segments of the business. Scientist and CEO alike can profit from the uncomplicated style of the editorial and, furthermore, gain a wealth of information on a diverse range of life science topics. In our articles, we challenge the industry to look at new ways of overcoming discovery bottlenecks, embrace new technologies and build next generation technology platforms.DDW aims to help the industry survive the 'revolution' as a fundamental read for all those involved in this dynamic sector where time is of the essence and knowledge is power.Subscription Options The available subscription periods for Drug Discovery World are: Purchase a single back issue £ 1.99Purchase a 3 months subscription £ 4.99 (1 issue)Purchase a 6 month subscription £ 7.99 (2 issues)Purchase an annual subscription £ 11.99 (4 issues)Your subscription will start with the latest available issue. - Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase - Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period - Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, and identify the cost of the renewal - Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's Account Settings after purchase - No cancellation of the current subscription is allowed during active subscription period - Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication. Abannan’s Privacy Policy and Terms of Use: https://www.abannan.com/UK/LegalNotices

desc: Una rivista unica nel panorama medico italiano, bimestrale, a colori edita da C.G. Edizioni Medico Scientifiche. Propone strumenti per gestire l'incertezza nella pratica clinica e strategie per ridurla, traendo spunto da insegnamenti in vari campi della medicina. Con oltre 20 anni di pubblicazioni offre al medico le migliori evidenze disponibili, sia su situazioni di comune riscontro sia su casi di più rara osservazione, con l’intento di fornire tutti gli strumenti necessari per una risposta efficace al paziente. Potrai leggere e avere sempre a portata di mano tutti i numeri e gli articoli da te scaricati nell'area "I miei Acquisti" del tuo iPad / iPhone, sempre disponibili sino a quando non deciderai di eliminarli.   Ad avvenuta conferma dell’acquisto di un articolo, un numero o un abbonamento annuale, il costo verrà addebitato sul tuo account iTunes. Per sottoscrivere l'abbonamento auto-rinnovabile fai 'Tap' su 'Abbonati ora' nella barra inferiore dell'App..   La durata dell'abbonamento è annuale con validità calcolata a partire dal giorno di sottoscrizione; di conseguenza il numero di pubblicazioni inclusi nell'abbonamento dipendono dalla periodicità dello stesso. L’abbonamento verrà rinnovato automaticamente tramite iTunes Store a seguito di una notifica comunicata 30 giorni prima della scadenza. Il costo del rinnovo sarà addebitato entro 24 ore dallo scadere dell’abbonamento corrente. Puoi disattivare il rinnovo automatico dal tuo account Apple, esprimendo la tua scelta almeno 24 ore prima dello scadere dell’abbonamento corrente. Non puoi cancellare il tuo abbonamento corrente prima dello scadere del termine.  Per ulteriori dettagli sulla gestione degli abbonamenti auto-rinnovabili puoi seguire le indicazioni della Apple presenti sulla seguente pagina di supporto http://support.apple.com/kb/HT4098?viewlocale=it_IT  I dati personali che eventualmente deciderai di condividere saranno utilizzati al solo scopo di fornirti un servizio sempre migliore.   Privacy Policy URL: http://www.cgems.it/inside2.aspx?ch=i.info.8

desc: For Angewandte Chemie International Edition, please see http://itunes.apple.com/us/app/angewandte-chemie-international/id547984912Eine führende Chemie-Zeitschrift ist jetzt auf dem iPad erhältlich. Frisch aus dem Zeitungskiosk bringt Ihnen die “Angewandte Chemie” eine anregende Mischung aus Aufsätzen, Highlights, Zuschriften und mehr mit nachhaltigem Einfluss. Genießen Sie ein vollständig neues Erlebnis beim Blättern und Lesen und bleiben Sie noch schneller auf dem laufenden mit den wichtigsten Entwicklungen in der chemischen Forschung:- Bleiben Sie auf dem laufenden mit den neuesten Artikeln in “Early View”, fast täglich neu.- Lassen Sie sich benachrichtigen, sobald ein neues Heft erscheint- Laden Sie Artikel und Hefte und lesen Sie offline.- Speichern Sie die wichtigsten Artikel und greifen Sie jederzeit leicht und schnell darauf zu.- Teilen Sie Artikel mit Kollegen, Mitarbeitern und Studierenden.CURRENT SUBSCRIBERS to Angewandte Chemie can “pair” their device with their personal or institutional subscription to enjoy full access in this iPad edition.SUBSCRIBE IN THE APP: Annual Subscriptions (52 issues) for the iPad-only edition are available for $599.99 (US) per year. To turn off auto-renew, go to your iTunes account settings after purchase. Note that subscriptions cannot be cancelled during the term of the subscription, but you can still turn off auto-renew to prevent automatic renewal of your subscription. Note that any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when you purchases a subscription.About the JournalDie “Angewandte Chemie” deckt alle Themen in der Chemie ab:- Organische und medizinische Chemie- Anorganische und metallorganische Chemie- Katalyse- Nachhaltige Chemie und Energie- Supramolekulare Chemie und Nanowissenschaften- Physikalische und theoretische Chemie- Materialwissenschaften und Polymerchemie- Biochemie und chemische Biologie- Analytische und bioanalytische ChemieDie Angewandte Chemie hat Rubriken, die alle Aspekte der Chemie behandeln. Aufsätze fassen wichtige Ergebnisse zusammen, weisen auf ungelöste Fragen hin und diskutieren mögliche Entwicklungen. In Essays werden Themen aus allen Bereichen der Chemie einschließlich der Wissenschaftsphilosophie und der Wissenschaftsgeschichte frei behandelt. In Highlights werden sehr wichtige neue Ergebnisse und Trends geschildert und ihre Bedeutung erläutert. In Editorials diskutieren bedeutende Autoren Themen wie Forschungspolitik, die Beziehung zwischen Wissenschaft und Gesellschaft und Bildung. Das Herz der Zeitschrift bilden jedoch die Zuschriften: Sorgfältig ausgewählt berichten sie über neueste Forschungsergebnisse und machen die Zeitschrift unentbehrlich für Chemiker, die gut informiert sein wollen.

desc: Edizione in lingua italiana di EMERGENCY MEDICINE PRACTICE,  rivista mensile unica nel mondo della medicina d'urgenza  edita da C.G. Edizioni Medico Scientifiche. Ogni numero propone un'analisi approfondita di un caso clinico, la diagnosi, gli esami strumentali e l'approccio terapeutico per gestire al meglio l'incertezza nella pratica clinica. Il medico verrà guidato passo passo nella diagnosi e nella ricerca della miglior soluzione possibile per il trattamento del paziente. Le domande finali di verifica apprendimento  permettono una rapida verifica dei contenuti appresi.Potrai leggere e avere sempre a portata di mano tutti i numeri e gli articoli da te scaricati nell'area "I miei Acquisti" del tuo iPad / iPhone, sempre disponibili sino a quando non deciderai di eliminarli. Ad avvenuta conferma dell’acquisto di un numero o di un abbonamento annuale, il costo verrà addebitato sul tuo account iTunes. Per sottoscrivere l'abbonamento auto-rinnovabile fai 'Tap' su 'Abbonati ora' nella barra inferiore dell'App.. La durata dell'abbonamento è annuale con validità calcolata a partire dal giorno di sottoscrizione; di conseguenza il numero di pubblicazioni inclusi nell'abbonamento dipendono dalla periodicità dello stesso. L’abbonamento verrà rinnovato automaticamente tramite iTunes Store a seguito di una notifica comunicata 30 giorni prima della scadenza. Il costo del rinnovo sarà addebitato entro 24 ore dallo scadere dell’abbonamento corrente. Puoi disattivare il rinnovo automatico dal tuo account Apple, esprimendo la tua scelta almeno 24 ore prima dello scadere dell’abbonamento corrente. Non puoi cancellare il tuo abbonamento corrente prima dello scadere del termine.Per ulteriori dettagli sulla gestione degli abbonamenti auto-rinnovabili puoi seguire le indicazioni della Apple presenti sulla seguente pagina di supporto http://support.apple.com/kb/HT4098?viewlocale=it_ITI dati personali che eventualmente deciderai di condividere saranno utilizzati al solo scopo di fornirti un servizio sempre migliore. Each issue examines a specific theme and explores various social, scientific, and paranormal controversies. We investigate claims of the paranormal, pseudoscience, fringe groups, cults and claims between: science, pseudoscience, junk science, voodoo science, pathological science, bad science, non science and plain old nonsense. Our contributors are top experts in their fields—leading scientists, scholars, and investigative journalists. The magazine has been called “stimulating and provocative" by Carl Sagan, “clearly superior…gutsy” by Edward O. Wilson, and “the best journal in the field” by Stephen Jay Gould. Our editor-in-chief, Dr. Michael Shermer, has been called the most prominent skeptic in America, and his monthly column in Scientific American, and his numerous books and media appearances have made Skeptic a respected voice in academia. Included in each issue of Skeptic is Junior Skeptic magazine. While written for younger readers, it provides an outstanding summary of classical paranormal topics, and is one of the favorite parts of the magazine for adults as well. desc: A\J is Canada’s Environmental Voice, publishing cutting-edge environmental journalism since 1971. Featuring thoughtful analysis by the nation’s foremost environmental thinkers about national and global issues, plus profiles of inspiring leaders and sustainable living ideas to steal, A\J offers both a vision of a more sustainable future and the tools needed to take us there.Blending ecological, social, political and economic perspectives, A\J provides a deeper level of analysis on environmental themes than can be gained from the mainstream press. Issues are thematically focused, presenting in-depth exploration of specific topics like water conservation, climate change, green energy and much more.A\J unites the Canadian environmental community with positive and proactive stories that offer real solutions, built upon our 40+ years of delivering Canada’s best environmental journalism.-------------------- This is a free app download. author: Wiley
desc: Wiley’s leading emergency medicine journal is now available on your iPad and iPhone. Academic Emergency Medicine is a comprehensive and reliable source of monthly research and information relevant to the practice, educational advancements, and investigation of emergency medicine. Enjoy an entirely new browsing and reading experience, and keep up to date with the most important developments even faster.CURRENT SUBSCRIBERS to Academic Emergency Medicine can “pair” their device with their personal or institutional subscription to enjoy full access in this iPad edition.SUBSCRIBE IN THE APP: Annual Subscriptions (12 issues) for the iPad-only edition are available for $189.99 (US) per year. Payment is charged to your iTunes account after confirmation of purchase. Academic Emergency Medicine subscriptions automatically renew within 24 hours of the end of your subscription period for $189.99 (US) unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the subscription period. To turn off auto-renew, go to your iTunes account settings after purchase. Note that subscriptions cannot be cancelled during the term of the subscription, but you can still turn off auto-renew to prevent automatic renewal of your subscription. Note that any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when you purchases a subscription.About the JournalAcademic Emergency Medicine (AEM) is the official monthly publication of the Society for Academic Emergency Medicine (SAEM) and publishes information relevant to the practice, educational advancements, and investigation of emergency medicine. It is the second largest peer-reviewed scientific journal in the specialty of emergency medicine.The Society for Academic Emergency Medicine (SAEM) is dedicated to the improvement of care of the acutely ill and injured patient by improving research and education. To achieve this mission, SAEM influences health policy through forums, publications, inter-organizational collaboration, policy development, and consultation services for physicians, teachers, researchers, and students. SAEM represents excellence and leadership in academic emergency medicine and its values include idealism and quality in all endeavors, nurturing and camaraderie and diversity among members, as well as creative and symbiotic interactions with other organizations.

author: Newton Inc. Apps.
desc: *** Newton International Edition は，初代iPadでもご覧いただけますが，より快適にご覧いただくためには，iPad2以上をご利用いただくことをおすすめします。 ***眼で見て,耳で聞いて,指でさわって楽しむことのできる,サイエンスマガジンがつくりたかった! それが,科学雑誌NewtonがiPad向けに創刊した「Newton International Edition」です。動画や音声, タッチ操作などをふんだんに取り入れながら, サイエンスを「なるほど!」と納得しながら, 楽しむためにiPad向けに特別に制作された, 待望のインタラクティブ・サイエンスマガジンです。-------特別増刊号『福島原発1000日ドキュメント』を刊行いたしました。発生から3年を迎えていまだに収束しない福島第一原発事故について、「あのときに何が起きたのか」「この3年間で何が行われてきたのか」をビジュアルに展開しています。原発のこれからを考える上での必携資料としてご活用ください。■ 福島第一原発の施設全体を3DCG化。制御棒の自動挿入による「原子炉の緊急停止」を動画で再現　科学雑誌『Newton』は、深刻な事故を起こした福島第一原発の施設全体を3DCGで再現しました。iPad版特別増刊号では、福島第一原発の施設全体を指でぐるぐるとまわしながら、くまなく観察することができます。　2011年3月11日午後2時46分、マグニチュード9.0の超巨大地震が発生し、福島第一原発を震度6強の強い揺れが襲いました。運転中だった1号機、2号機、3号機の原子炉は制御棒の自動挿入によって緊急停止しました。iPad版特別増刊号では、この緊急停止の様子がわかる動画が収録されています。■ 巨大津波の襲来からメルトダウンまでの一部始終を、動画とインタラクティブ・イラストで検証　地震によって送電鉄塔が倒壊し、配電設備も破壊されたことによって、各原子炉は外部電源を喪失し、非常用ディーゼル発電機が自動起動しました。そして、午後3時35分に襲来した巨大津波によって各原子炉建屋とタービン建屋が浸水し、非常用ディーゼル発電機も水没して機能を失いました。　こうしてすべての電源を失った1号機、2号機、3号機では、緊急停止後も熱を放つ核燃料の冷却手段が失われ、夜10時頃に恐れていた核燃料の溶融、すなわちメルトダウンが1号機ではじまりました。iPad版特別増刊号では、巨大津波の襲来と電源喪失、非常用冷却装置の停止、そしてメルトダウンへと至るまでの一部始終を動画で検証しています。■ 恐れていた「放射性物質の大量放出」が現実に。iPad版特別増刊号でその経緯が確認できます　1号機に続いて、2号機、3号機でも同様にメルトダウンが発生し、1号機、2号機、3号機の原子炉は破壊されて放射性物質が大量に放出されました。こうして発生した福島原発事故は、その後も事故を積み重ね、空・地下・海に放射性物質の漏洩汚染を続けています。　iPad版特別増刊号では、原子炉に閉じ込められていたはずの放射性物質が、いつ、どこから、どのようにして空・海・地下へと放出されたのかについて、その実態と実状を確認できます。■ 刊行1か月間は特価500円。まずはiPadの「Newsstand」でアプリをインストールしてください　特別増刊号は、価格800円のところ、3月11日から4月10日までの1か月間は特価500円で販売いたします。『Newton International Edition』を定期購読中の方は無料でダウンロードできます。＊ 『Newton International Edition』3月号の特集記事『過酷事故 連鎖の5日間 福島第一原発』は、特別増刊号『福島原発1000日ドキュメント』の一部を先行して掲載したものです。＊紙版のNewtonとは別に,iPad向けに制作したものです。--------■購読方法1号ごとの通常号の購入:500円(創刊号は無料)。1年間定期購読(自動継続):3000円。-自動継続は,購読期間終了の24時間以上前に自動更新設定をオフにすることで停止できます。-購読期間中は,期間の変更やキャンセルはできません。■「保管」機能について一度購入した号は「保管」しておくことができます。「保管」ボタンを押すと,iPadからデータは消えますが, 何度でも無料で再ダウンロードすることができます。
name: Newton International Edition
require: 需要 iOS 5.0 或更高版本。与 iPad 兼容。

desc: Now itís easy to stay current with the latest science and research in emergency medicine. The Annals of Emergency Medicine iPad app brings you the convenience of reading your favorite journal from anywhere in the world with just a tap.-Browse each new monthly issue -Read new Online First articles throughout the month- Play in-article videos-Save articles on your device-Bookmark key articles and take notes for follow-up later-Email useful images or articles-Post useful articles on your Facebook or Twitter account for colleague awareness-Search the locally stored contentABOUT Annals of Emergency MedicineAnnals of Emergency Medicine, the official journal of the American College of Emergency Physicians, is an international, peer-reviewed journal dedicated to improving the quality of care by publishing the highest quality science for emergency medicine and related medical specialties. Annals publishes original research, clinical reports, opinion, and educational information related to the practice, teaching, and research of emergency medicine. In addition to general emergency medicine topics, Annals regularly publishes articles on out-of-hospital emergency medical services, pediatric emergency medicine, injury and disease prevention, health policy and ethics, disaster management, toxicology, and related topics. author: 4Mobi Tecnologia em Midia Ltda.
desc: O novo aplicativo da ABRELPE para Ipad e Iphone disponibiliza as mais importantes publicações da entidade relacionadas à gestão de resíduos sólidos. De forma interativa e com facilidade na pesquisa dos temas, o aplicativo traz entre os títulos a Conexão Academia, a Revista Científica sobre Resíduos Sólidos, que veicula estudos acadêmicos sobre o tema resíduos sólidos. Outra publicação da ABRELPE, o Panorama dos Resíduos Sólidos no Brasil, traz uma visão geral da situação da gestão de resíduos sólidos no país, com a disponibilização de informações consolidadas, completas e confiáveis, convenientemente tratadas por região e por unidade da federação, sendo um documento de referência para a consulta de dados sobre o setor. O aplicativo permite uma leitura dinâmica e o compartilhamento de textos e arquivos nas redes sociais, sendo mais uma ferramenta que amplia a disseminação de informações sobre um tema de grande importância, tornando-as acessíveis por parte dos órgãos governamentais, empresas públicas e privadas, ONG’s, entidades educativas e de pesquisa, imprensa e sociedade em geral.

author: LabX Media Group Inc.
desc: For more than 25 years, The Scientist Magazine has been an independent source reporting on the most exciting discoveries and trends across the spectrum of life science research, technology, news, business, and careers. Our mission is to offer researchers engaging and unbiased coverage of the latest happenings both in and outside their own disciplines to inspire scientific innovation. We explore a variety of life science topics including: Genomics and Genetics, Cancer Research, Neuroscience, Cell Biology and much more. The Scientist Magazine app offers the digital versions of the magazine and its supplements on your iPad for a low annual fee. You can purchase a 1-year auto-renewing subscription for $34.99 or a 6-month auto-renewing subscription for $19.99. Subscription payments will be charged to your iTunes account at the confirmation of purchase. Your account will be charged for renewal within the 24 hours prior to the end of the current subscription period and the cost of the renewal will be identified. You can manage your subscriptions and turn off auto-renewal by going to your Account Settings after purchase. Please note that you will not be allowed to cancel your current subscription during the active subscription period.

author: Holden Sailinger
desc: 新增反恐逃生实用技巧和视频，当发生恐怖袭击，地震火灾，暴雨洪水，你该怎么办？这本生存手册将成为你躲避灾害和野外生存的必备武器！【超级实用的自救攻略+视频讲解】■ 遭遇恐怖袭击，如何自救逃生（2014年3月1日的昆明事件让我们每个人都感到震惊，我们应该学习一些必要的反恐逃生知识！说不定在危急时刻就能救命防身）■ 城市自救攻略，中国第一保镖视频教学，告诉你逃出生天的4大要诀！■ 地震中自救的10项要领■ 暴雨洪水来袭时的避难方法■ 火灾发生时如何逃生■ 野外如何辨别方向？■ 怎么寻找可以食用的野果野菜（相信我，你的小区草地上就有可以食用的野菜）■ 可以食用的昆虫以及食用方法（哪些可以直接生吃）■ 如何寻找水源（大量植物动物都可以从中取水）■ 野外饮用水的净化处理（食品卫生什么时候都要讲究啊）■ 如何钻木取火（八种方法，没事儿试一下挺有意思！）■ 各种受伤后的自救方法（骨折，溺水，烧伤，毒蛇咬伤，食物中毒，神马？还有突然分娩急救法-_-|||）■ 以及如何准备一个防备各种灾难的应急包本书主要讲解应对各种灾难危机的知识，但并不意味着我们需要整日惴惴不安。只是希望大家学习了解一些必要的生存求生知识，说不定在危急时刻就能救你一命！希望本手册成为你躲避灾害和野外生存的必备武器。【功能特点】• 图文并茂，轻松阅读各种危机及应对方法• 内嵌视频，帮你更快掌握危机下的生存手段• 便捷目录，帮助你迅速查找各种危机和处理最后，如果您觉得本手册有用，请务必推荐给好友，希望大家都能具备一定的防患意识，但永远都不要用到它。

author: Wiley
desc: About the AppRead the leading weekly materials science journal “Advanced Materials” on your iPad and iPhone – a high-impact spectrum of original research Communications and cutting-edge Review Articles, Progress Reports and Research News. Enjoy the best of materials science at your fingertips and be the first to read up on the latest developments in materials science and chemistry, physics and engineering:- Access the latest articles through EarlyView – updated almost daily- Be notified of new issues- Download articles for offline perusal- Save your favorites for quick and easy access- Share articles with colleagues, students and friends“AM” has enjoyed strong growth of its ISI Impact Factor over the last years, reaching 13.877 in 2011. It is the flagship of Wiley-VCH’s materials science portfolio which includes sister journals “Advanced Functional Materials”, “Advanced Energy Materials”, “Advanced Healthcare Materials”, “Advanced Optical Materials” as well as nanotechnology cousin “Small”.CURRENT SUBSCRIBERS to Advanced Materials can “pair” their device with their personal or institutional subscription to enjoy full access in this iPad edition.SUBSCRIBE IN THE APP: Annual Subscriptions (52 issues) for the iPad-only edition are available for $699.99 (US) per year. Payment is charged to your iTunes account after confirmation of purchase. Advanced Materials subscriptions automatically renew within 24 hours of the end of your subscription period for $699.99 (US) unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the subscription period. To turn off auto-renew, go to your iTunes account settings after purchase. Note that subscriptions cannot be cancelled during the term of the subscription, but you can still turn off auto-renew to prevent automatic renewal of your subscription. Note that any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when you purchases a subscription.About the JournalAdvanced Materials has been publishing the latest progress in materials science for 25 years. Carefully selected Review Articles, Progress Reports, Communications and Research News cover the cutting edge of the chemistry and physics of functional materials. The top quality of the journal is reflected in its ISI Impact Factor, which has grown consistently to well over 10 in recent years (13.877 for 2011), making Advanced Materials one of the leading journals in materials science worldwide. Access over 800 articles per year through the Advanced Materials App to see what’s hot in materials science, materials chemistry, physics and device engineering.Learn more about the Advanced journals family published by Wiley-VCH at www.advmat.de, including Full-Paper sister journal Advanced Functional Materials, our prime nanotechnology journal Small and our newest successes, Advanced Energy Materials, Advanced Healthcare Materials and Advanced Optical Materials.

author: Magzter Inc.
desc: India Today is an Indian weekly news magazine published by Living Media India Limited, in publication since 1975 based in New Delhi. India Today is also the name of its sister-publication in Hindi. author: Wiley
desc: A leading chemistry journal is now available on your iPad. Fresh from the newsstand, “Angewandte Chemie International Edition” brings you a stimulating, high-impact mixture of Review Articles, Highlights, Communications, and more. Enjoy an entirely new browsing and reading experience, and keep up to date with the most important developments in chemical research even faster: •             Stay current with the latest articles through Early View – updated almost daily.•             Be notified when a new weekly issue is available.•             Download articles and issues for offline perusal.•             Save your favorite articles for quick and easy access.•             Share articles with colleagues or students. CURRENT SUBSCRIBERS to Angewandte Chemie International Edition can "pair" their device with their personal or institutional subscription to enjoy full access in this iPad edition. SUBSCRIBE IN THE APP: Annual Subscriptions (52 issues) for the iPad-only edition are available for $599.99 per year. Payment is charged to your iTunes account after confirmation of purchase. Angewandte Chemie International Edition subscriptions automatically renew within 24 hours of the end of your subscription period for $599.99 unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the subscription period. To turn off auto-renew, go to your iTunes account settings after purchase. Note that subscriptions cannot be cancelled during the term of the subscription, but you can still turn off auto-renew to prevent automatic renewal of your subscription. Note that any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when you purchases a subscription.Deutsch: http://itunes.apple.com/de/app/angewandte-chemie/id672992908 Angewandte Chemie covers all areas of chemistry: •             Organic and Medicinal Chemistry•             Inorganic and Organometallic Chemistry•             Catalysis•             Sustainable Chemistry and Energy Research•             Supramolecular Chemistry and Nanoscience•             Physical and Computational Chemistry•             Materials Science and Polymer Chemistry•             Biochemistry and Chemical Biology•             Analytical and Bioanalytical Chemistry Angewandte Chemie has article categories covering all aspects of the field. Reviews summarize the important results of recent research on topical subjects in all branches of chemistry, point to unresolved problems and discuss possible developments. The Essays freely address themes from every aspect of chemistry, including the philosophy or history of science. Concise evaluations of current trends in chemical research can be found in the Highlights. In the Editorials, eminent authors discuss topics such as research politics, the relationship of chemistry and society, and chemical education. The core of the journal, however, is the Communications. These are critically selected and report on the latest research results, making the journal indispensable to the chemist who wants to stay well informed. Angewandte Chemie also regularly publishes Nobel lectures in chemistry and related fields. Angewandte Chemie is owned by the Gesellschaft Deutscher Chemiker (German Chemical Society, GDCh) and published by Wiley-VCH. We are looking forward to your feedback.

author: Society for Science & the Public
desc: Science News magazine, now available on the iPad, is for readers who want to know about the latest in science and truly understand how those discoveries are made. Founded in 1922, Science News is a leading biweekly magazine covering new research findings from across the spectrum of scientific disciplines. We write about science in plain English, explaining current advances and how the latest findings are moving knowledge forward.Each issue delivers the top science news as reported by a team of experienced science journalists, each expert in the field they cover. The categories covered include Atom & Cosmos, Earth, Environment, Life, Humans, Brain & Mind, Health & Illness, Genes & Cells, Matter & Energy and Molecules.   Science News features concise write-ups of the most important and intriguing recent discoveries, plus in-depth feature stories that reveal how science works; notices and reviews of new science-related books, films and exhibits; a variety of rotating short news items (including the “It’s Alive” column on weird and wonderful creatures; “How Bizarre,” about the unexpected and far out side of science; and “Mystery Solved” about new ways of looking at scientific conundrums) and Science Visualized, a photo or infographic exploring the world of science through image.Science News is published biweekly (26 times a year) by the nonprofit Society for Science & the Public.  In-App Subscription available: 1-month subscription for $4.99, automatically renewed until canceled1-year subscription for $49.99, automatically renewed until canceled  AUTOMATIC-RENEWAL FEATURE: For all subscriptions, your credit card will automatically be charged for another subscription period unless you change your subscription preferences in your account settings. All subscriptions will automatically renew until canceled through the iTunes store.

author: University of Adelaide
desc: e-Science is a free science magazine written by real researchers for both teachers and the public. Since researchers write this magazine, their articles cover really unique areas of science and the research they are doing in that area.The majority of articles in this magazine relate to The 10 Big Questions: http://www.sciences.adelaide.edu.au/future/elfs/elfs.html•UNIVERSE   How did the Universe begin? •EARTH  How does the Earth work? •LIFE  What is life? •EVOLUTION  How did life evolve on Earth? •DISEASE  How do we unravel the causes of disease? •CLIMATE  Why does climate change? •SUSTAINABILITY How can we feed the World sustainably? •FUEL  How can we reduce our reliance on fossil fuels? •CONSERVATION How will we conserve species diversity? •NANOSCIENCE  Where will the nanoscience revolution take us? Each article has linked interactive activities/resources that can be used to further the reader’s scientific knowledge. These activities and resources are likely to be especially useful for educators, providing a one stop shop for both the article and related activities. Ultimately we are offering a fusion between a science magazine, scientific app and lesson plan guide!

For qualifying subscribers, access to the Tablet Edition is concurrent with their print or digital subscription. The Scientific American Tablet Edition for iPad is available from the July 2012 issue forward.    Please contact customer service if you have questions about your Tablet Edition entitlement or if you would like to upgrade your current subscription to include the Tablet Edition for iPad. CUSTOMER SERVICE: 1-800-333-1199.   Email:  iPad@sciam.com.SUBSCRIBERS AUTOMATIC RENEWAL FEATURE: Your subscription will automatically renew unless auto-renew is disabled at least 24-hours before the end of the current monthly period. Your iTunes account will be automatically charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the annual subscription period for the subscription price of $34.99. Founded in 1845, Scientific American is the longest continuously published magazine in the US and the home of the most exciting authors presenting the most dynamic ideas in science today. As the leading popular source and authority on science, technology, and innovation, Scientific American’s award-winning scientist-authored content engages, educates and inspires current and future generations of curious citizens and public and private sector leaders.

author: MagazineCloner.com Limited
desc: Motociclismo Fuoristrada nasce nel marzo del 2003 con l’ambizione di diventare il punto di riferimento principale per tutti gli appassionati del mondo “off road” e per tutti gli operatori del settore. Dal punto di vista editoriale i contenuti si suddividono tra le varie discipline che compongono il fuoristrada: Cross, Enduro, Supermotard e Trial, tutte trattate con l’autorevolezza, la competenza e la grande tradizione di Motociclismo. Le anticipazioni sui nuovi modelli, le prove pratiche e strumentali dei materiali e dell’abbigliamento, l’analisi tecnica delle moto da competizione, gli approfondimenti “politici” con interviste ai personaggi di spicco del settore e inchieste sulle nuove tendenze del mercato, sono l’asse portante della rivista. Centro proveLe prove, a volte anche comparative tra modelli, sono autorevoli e rigorose nei giudizi grazie alle apparecchiature all’avanguardia di cui è dotato il Centro Prove e Servizi. (l’unico di una rivista italiana certificato TÜV).--------------------------------------------- L'applicazione è scaricabile gratuitamente e ciascun numero potrà essere acquistato all'interno di essa. All'interno dell'applicazione è possibile anche sottoscrivere abbonamenti. Gli abbonamenti disponibili sono: 6 mesi: £11.99/ US$16.99/ €13,99 (6 numeri) 12 mesi: £22.99/ US$32.99/ €25,99 (12 numeri) - L'abbonamento verrà automaticamente rinnovato a meno che non sia annullato a non oltre 24 ore dalla fine del periodo di validità. Nelle 24 ore precedenti la fine dell'abbonamento, vi sarà addebitato automaticamente l'importo di rinnovo per la stessa durata e alle condizioni economiche in vigore al momento. - E' possibile disabilitare il rinnovo automatico degli abbonamenti nelle impostazioni del vs account, tuttavia in questo modo non potrete annullare l'abbonamento in corso durante il periodo di validità. - L'importo del pagamento sarà addebitato sul vs account iTunes alla conferma dell'acquisto e ogni porzione inutilizzata di periodo di prova gratis verrà annullata al momento della sottoscrizione di un abbonamento alla stessa rivista. "Pacchetti numeri arretrati"/ Il credito per numeri arretrati può essere acquistato all'interno dell'app. Per usare i crediti acquistati, cliccare semplicemente sul prezzo del numero e scegliere di usare il credito disponibile.E' possibile entrare nell'applicazione come un utente registrato su Pocketmags. Questo protegge i vs numeri in caso di smarrimento del device e permette la lettura dei numeri acquistati su piattaforme multiple. Gli utenti Pocketmags esistenti possono recuperare i propri acquisti entrando con le proprie credenziali.  Vi raccomandiamo di creare un account Pocketmags. Se non riuscite a crearlo dall'interno dell'app per cortesia andate su www.pocketmags.com/register.aspx e poi all'interno dell'app effettuate l'accesso con le credenziali appena create.Si raccomanda di caricare per la prima volta l'applicazione in un'area wi-fi in modo che tutti i dati del numero possano essere scaricati. Se l'applicazione non parte dopo la pagina iniziale in seguito alla prima installazione o a un aggiornamento, si consiglia di cancellare e reinstallare l'applicazione dall'App Store.  Per Aiuto e Domande Frequenti all'interno dell'app, cliccate sul bottone con il punto di domanda sulla schermata principale dell'app.Per assistenza su qualsiasi argomento, per cortesia scrivete a help@pocketmags.com indicando il nome del vs account e allegando la ricevuta dell'eventuale acquisto.

La rivista, che vanta molte edizioni in tutto il mondo, celebra l'ambito della mountain bike sotto ogni aspetto, consentendo ai biker di qualsiasi livello ed età  di godere dei momenti migliori in sella. Mountain Biking Italia presenta tutorial di altissima qualità  e le recensioni delle migliori bici e della componentistica, scritti dai più accreditati esperti del settore. Il magazine propone inoltre i percorsi più interessanti e adrenalinici. Mountain Biking Italia parla con autenticità , da appassionati ad appassionati Per questo Mountain Biking Italia è diverso. È più smart. È più Mountain Biking. Su Mountain Biking Italia sono disponibili anche gli abbonamenti auto-rinnovabili. Nello store, accanto al pulsante di acquisto dell'ultimo numero, troverai il pulsante "Abbonati". Premi il pulsante per vedere quali forme di abbonamento auto rinnovabili sono previste e procedi all'acquisto. L'ultimo numero della rivista disponibile online, non incluso nell'abbonamento in quanto pubblicato in data precedente alla data di sottoscrizione, sarà comunque scaricato automaticamente e al termine del download sarà disponibile nella tua libreria. Attento a non cancellarlo altrimenti dovrai pagarlo per poterlo avere in maniera definitiva nella tua libreria. Gli abbonamenti attualmente previsti sono: - Abbonamento annuale: della durata di 12 mesi, automaticamente rinnovabile, valido per 365 giorni, a partire dal giorno di acquisto. Il costo dell'abbonamento sarà addebitato sul tuo conto iTunes e sarà legato al tuo Apple ID, potrai quindi usufruirne su tutti i dispositivi in condivisione. Ogni abbonamento sarà rinnovato automaticamente 24 ore prima della sua scadenza, ma sarai avvisato via email direttamente da Apple, alcuni giorni prima della scadenza e potrai decidere se rinnovare o meno in maniera semplice e veloce, direttamente dal tuo iPad o dal tuo PC con iTunes. Ti basterà accedere alla sezione 'Gestisci iscrizioni App' nella finestra 'Visualizza account' dell'AppStore e toccare la categoria di iscrizione per cui desideri disattivare il rinnovo automatico. Abbonarsi è davvero conveniente: - Acquisto numero singolo: 3,59€ - Abbonamento annuale: 29,99€ I dati personali che eventualmente deciderai di condividere con noi saranno utilizzati al solo scopo di fornirti un servizio sempre migliore. Qui trovi la nostra informativa sulla privacy in merito al trattamento dei tuoi dati personali: http://www.playmediacompany.it/privacy/privacy-app.asp

desc: Das ePaper der BRAVO Sport ist das digitale Sportmagazin für junge Sportbegeisterte, die alle 2 Wochen das Neueste rund um Fußball, Fun- und Actionsport, Formel 1 und natürlich US-Sports wie Basketball oder Football wissen wollen.Das digitale Magazin bietet zahlreiche praktische Lesefunktionen, um kompetente Berichte, hautnahe Erlebnisreportagen sowie jede Menge Fakten rund um die angesagtesten Sportthemen, zu Sport-Games und Handy-Aktionen multimedial zu ergänzen: z.B. die Suche nach Stichworten, das Blättern über den Touchscreen und das Zoomen an Texte, Artikel und Fotos. Dazu kommen jede Menge Seiten über Sportmode, Equipment, Spaß und Unterhaltung. Kurzum: dieses ePaper ist ein komfortables Stück Sport, den Sie im Abo überall und immer aktuell downloaden können.Für sportbegeisterte Jugendliche, die kompetente Sport-News, Unterhaltung und trendige Tipps in einem suchen.Preise: Einzelausgabe für 1,79 Euro 1-Monatsabonnement für 3,59 Euro1 Halbjahresabonnement für 20,99 Euro 1 Jahresabonnement für 39,99 Euro Hinweise zum In App-Abonnement: Sie haben verschiedene Möglichkeiten, Ausgaben von BRAVO Sport zu lesen. author: GRUPO V SL
desc: Con la aplicación de Bikes World tve/tdp podrás suscribirte o descargarte cada mes la revista con la información más práctica, amena y divertida sobre la mountain bike.La revista de MTB más innovadora te sorprenderá ya que ofrece una visión distinta a la actual oferta editorial. Bikes World destaca por su enfoque práctico y su acercamiento a todos los aficionados a la Mountain Bike. No importa si eres un aficionado nóvel o veterano, ni tu capacidad adquisitiva. Bikes World ofrece pruebas a fondo sobre las últimas novedades, comparativas y tests de bicis, equipo y complementos, desde lo más profesional hasta lo más asequible para todos los bolsillos. Además en la revista encuentras los consejos más útiles para mejorar la técnica y el rendimiento en tus rodajes, las claves para conseguir la mejor forma física, y las mejores rutas para disfrutar con tu bici.Tanto si eres un apasionado de la MTB como si estás empezando con tu afición, Bikes World es tu revista.Compra un ejemplar por separado o suscríbete y conseguirás grandes descuentos para poder disfrutar de la revista desde tu iPad, simplemente descargando cada nuevo número en cuanto esté disponible en el quiosco. Disfruta de la revista Bikes World como la encuentras en tu quiosco, pero con la comodidad de hacerlo desde tu tablet, a un precio muy atractivo y de forma instantánea.Elige tu opción de suscripción preferida, ahórrate el máximo con la oferta de suscrición anual. Los diferentes tipos de suscripción son: 1 mes, trimestral, semestral y anual y empiezan con el último número disponible.El precio de un número individual es de 1,79 €Los precios de las suscripciones son:1 mes: 1,79 €Trimestral: 4,49 € Semestral: 7,99 € Anual: 13,99 €- El pago sera cargado a tu cuenta de iTunes cuando confirmes la compra.- Tu suscripción se renueva automáticamente a menos que la autorenovación sea deshabilitada al menos 24 horas antes del final del período de la suscripción en curso.- 24 horas antes del fin del período de vigencia de la suscripción se te cargará en tu cuenta la renovación por el mismo período, por la misma duración y a la tarifa vigente de suscripción para ese producto.- Tú mismo puedes gestionar tus suscripciones y deshabilitar la autorenovación yendo a la configuración personal de tu cuenta después de la compra.- No se permiten cancelaciones de suscripciones durante el período vigente de suscripción. Esto no afecta a tus derechos establecidos por la ley.- Cuando compres una suscripción no perderás ninguna parte sin usar del período de prueba gratuito, en caso de que éste haya sido ofrecido.- Podremos recoger información sobre el uso de esta aplicación, tanto si el uso es on-line como off-line. Para  más información, por favor, entra y mira nuestra política de privacidad.Al comprar una suscripción o descargar una aplicación, confirmas que has leído y aceptado la política de privacidad y condiciones de uso de Grupo V.http://www.grupovmedia.com/docs/privacidad_de_la_app.htmlhttp://www.grupovmedia.com/docs/condiciones_de_uso_de_la_app.html

desc: New Zealand Snowboarder is created by a group of dedicated snowboarders who have been a part of the evolution of snowboarding in New Zealand and around the world. New Zealand’s original snowboarding magazine, issue #1 went on sale in May 1993 on the back of the epic winter of ’92. The content of every issue always has a New Zealand connection… either a Kiwi riding overseas, anybody riding our mountains, or a New Zealand photographer behind the lens. desc: Since 2004, [R]evolution has been showcasing the new face of Australian MTB in it’s pages. In a nutshell, the new generation of riding from the riders perspective.100% rider owned, operated and proudly produced entirely in Australia, [R]evolution is dedicated to documenting this changing face of MTB on these shores. We do this through progressive riding, the finest photography, passionate and expert editorial along with dedicated design, all fused together in a package that speaks from the rider to the rider.[R]evolution is created by those who live and breathe the lifestyle. One that is put together with the same energy that propels these same people across all kind of terrain on two wheels. And instead of dabbling with the massive scope that MTB now offers, [R]evolution stays true to it’s core reader. Namely those with bigger tires, bigger aspirations and bigger balls. From dirt jumpers, street thrashers, downhillers and all-mountain weekend bar bangers, [R]evolution is there to showcase their progressive and evolving styles.Published quarterly, [R]evolution represents both the riders and the industry, bringing them together in a package that can stand on it’s own on the newsagent shelf against any MTB publication from around the world.[R]evolution is the voice for the changing face of Australian MTB.-Back issues and future issues are available for purchase within the App.Future issues are also available through the following auto-renewing subscription(s):- 1 Year: $12.99/£8.99The subscription will include the current issue if you do not already own it and subsequently published future issues. author: BESTELEVEN Co.,Ltd
desc: 베스트일레븐(Best Eleven)은 1970년 창간한 《대한민국 축구전문지의 자존심》이다. 문화를 즐긴다는 자체가 사치에 가까웠던 그 무렵에 우리도 축구전문지 하나쯤은 있어야하지 않겠냐는 사명감으로 닻을 올린 이래 지금껏 꼿꼿하게 길을 가고 있다. 한국축구와 함께 걸어갈 누군가, 한국축구의 역사를 차곡차곡 정리하고 기록하는 누군가가 있어야한다는 사명감이 지금의 베스트일레븐을 만들었다.세계 축구의 빠른 발전과 변화에 대처하고 나날이 높아지는 독자들의 수준과 눈높이를 맞추기 위한 노력 여기에 40년이 넘는 노하우가 합쳐지면서 베스트일레븐은 국내 최고의 축구잡지로 명성을 두텁게 하고 있다. 늘 축구만을 생각하는 전문기자들의 빼어난 필력과 감각적이고 생동감 넘치는 국내외 사진들 그리고 이를 세련되게 포장하는 디자이너들의 센스가 어우러져 나날이 진보하고 있다는 평가를 받는 베스트일레븐은 수 백 종이 넘는 대한민국의 스포츠·레저 잡지 중에서도 확고부동한 인기잡지로 명성을 쌓고 있다. 대한민국의 유일하다 싶은 전문지답게 수많은 국내 축구기자들의 지침서이자 교과서의 역할을 하고 있으며 축구 마니아들에게는 필독서로 자리매김했다. 매거진의 부족한 부분을 메우기 위해 2009년 12월 닻을 올린 베스트일레븐닷컴(www.besteleven.com) 역시 대동소이한 대한민국 축구 온라인미디어 풍토에 적잖은 파장을 일으키고 있다.[BestEleven 정기구독]권당 : $ 4.996 개월 : $11.991년 : $19.99* 정기구독 기간이 지나면 자동으로 재결재 됩니다.* 자동 재결재를 원하지 않을 경우 사용자 계정 설정에서 가입환경 설정을 변경하시기 바랍니다.* 정기구독 기간 중에는 취소 환불이 불가능합니다.[개인정보취급방침]http://app.soluwin.co.kr/privacyinfo.html-앱 제작 : (주)성도솔루윈의 "MBook Editor"로 편집 및 "HARMONY" 서비스로 제작 되었습니다.(www.Soluwin.co.kr)

desc: Freshwater Fishing Australia magazine was first published over 24 years ago and is an institution for many of our country’s freshwater anglers. It is one of the longest running fishing magazines in the country. For two decades, the country’s leading fishing journalists have been providing the best information for our anglers. The quality of the publication has resulted in many local anglers retaining every copy of the magazine ever published. Freshwater Fishing continues to hold the trophy of the country’s most popular freshwater only publication.Every two months Freshwater Fishing Australia’s team of expert writers update you on what’s working and where to fish. All techniques from fly fishing for trout through baitfishing for goldens to casting soft plastic for barra – and every variation between. The magazine’s popularity and strength is its concentration on providing information that fishers can apply to improve their success rate in a way that all readers can understand. All of the well-known and respected fishing writers have contributed to this magazine at some time in its history. Current experts who are regular contributors include Bill Classon, Greg French, Rod Harrison, Trevor Hawkins, Rod Mackenzie, Andrew McGovern, Frank Prokop, Steve Starling, Nigel Webster and Philip Weigall.----------------------This is a free app with paid issues.Further future issues and back issues can be purchased within the app.Subscriptions are also available within the application. author: Fabio Schaefer
desc: Verpasst mit der "Gravity Mountainbike Magazine" (ehemals "6undZwanzig") App keine einzige Ausgabe des beliebten Gravity Mountainbike Magazins. Egal, ob eine bestimmte Ausgabe oder gleich ein digitales Abo, mit dieser App habt ihr die Wahl! Freut euch über spannende Stories, interessante Interviews und Tests aus der Welt des Gravity Mountainbike Lifestyles.Freeride, Downhill, Enduro und Dirt. Das sind nicht bloß Varianten des Mountainbike-Sports, sie stehen auch für einen Lifestyle, bei dem sich Leidenschaft und Adrenalin mit Ästhetik verbinden. Das „Gravity Mountainbike Magazine" ist genau aus dieser Mischung entstanden und wird daher mit authentischem Inhalt auf hochwertigstem Papier gedruckt oder als digitale App angeboten.Alle zwei Monate erscheint das „Gravity Mountainbike Magazine" in Deutschland, Österreich, Schweiz und Luxemburg am Kiosk, im Direktvertrieb (www.gravity-magazine.de) und liegt in ausgewählten Bikeshops aus. Zudem ist das „Gravity Mountainbike Magazine" auch weltweit als digitale App erhältlich.Bitte beachten Sie:- Mit dem neuen Apple Betriebssystem iOS 5 finden Sie die App direkt im Zeitungskiosk (Newsstand).- Sobald Sie das Abonnement bestätigt haben, wird Ihr iTunes-Konto mit dem entsprechenden Betrag belastet.- Das Abonnement verlängert sich automatisch um die entsprechende Laufzeit, wenn Sie die automatische Verlängerung nicht bis 24 Stunden vor dem Ende der Laufzeit in den iTunes-Benutzereinstellungen deaktivieren.- Eine Rückvergütung ist nicht möglich, sollten Sie das Abonnement während der Laufzeit kündigen wollen. Sie erhalten in jedem Fall alle Ausgaben bis zum Ende der abgeschlossenen Laufzeit. Preise: Einzelexemplar: 3,59 EUR 12 Monate: 19,99 EUR
