author: Simplicissimus Book Farm srl
desc: Tutto quello che c'è da sapere sul mondo del tennis!Un mensile in edicola e on-line sempre a ridosso dei grandi appuntamenti di ogni stagione.Diretto da Daniele Azzolini e Stefano Semeraro, con Adriano Panatta direttore editoriale, Matchpoint Tennis Magazine è l'unico mensile del tennis che esca in accordo con il calendario del tennis, una peculiarità  che consente alla rivista di essere in edicola sempre a ridosso dei grandi appuntamenti della stagione. La forza di Matchpoint sta nell'essere sempre al passo con l'attualità , nelle analisi e nei commenti puntuali e approfonditi. Nelle sue pagine sono presenti i migliori giornalisti di tennis (Rino Tommasi, Ubaldo Scanagatta, Stefano Semeraro, Stefano Meloccaro, Vincenzo Martucci, Daniele Azzolini, Gianluca Atlante), grandi campioni e tecnici quotati (Adriano Panatta, Paolo Bertolucci, Bob Brett, Raffaella Reggi, Massimo D'Adamo) e i migliori fotografi del settore, guidati da Gianni Ciaccia.Su Matchpoint TENNIS sono disponibili anche gli abbonamenti auto-rinnovabili. Nello store, accanto al pulsante di acquisto dell'ultimo numero, troverai il pulsante "Abbonati". Premi il pulsante per vedere quali forme di abbonamento auto rinnovabili sono previste e procedi all'acquisto. L'ultimo numero della rivista disponibile online, non incluso nell'abbonamento in quanto pubblicato in data precedente alla data di sottoscrizione, sarà comunque scaricato automaticamente e al termine del download sarà disponibile nella tua libreria. Attento a non cancellarlo altrimenti dovrai pagarlo per poterlo avere in maniera definitiva nella tua libreria. Gli abbonamenti attualmente previsti sono: - Abbonamento annuale: della durata di 12 mesi, automaticamente rinnovabile, valido per 365 giorni, a partire dal giorno di acquisto. Il costo dell'abbonamento sarà addebitato sul tuo conto iTunes e sarà legato al tuo Apple ID, potrai quindi usufruirne su tutti i dispositivi in condivisione. Ogni abbonamento sarà rinnovato automaticamente 24 ore prima della sua scadenza, ma sarai avvisato via email direttamente da Apple, alcuni giorni prima della scadenza e potrai decidere se rinnovare o meno in maniera semplice e veloce, direttamente dal tuo iPad o dal tuo PC con iTunes. Ti basterà accedere alla sezione 'Gestisci iscrizioni App' nella finestra 'Visualizza account' dell'AppStore e toccare la categoria di iscrizione per cui desideri disattivare il rinnovo automatico. Abbonarsi è davvero conveniente: - Acquisto numero singolo: 2,69€ - Abbonamento annuale: 17,99€ I dati personali che eventualmente deciderai di condividere con noi saranno utilizzati al solo scopo di fornirti un servizio sempre migliore. Qui trovi la nostra informativa sulla privacy in merito al trattamento dei tuoi dati personali: http://www.ultimakiosk.it/privacy-policy/
name: Matchpoint TENNIS

author: Fishington Studios
desc: 绘图记事本专业版的设计美观新颖,用于创建和管理您所有的笔记、素描、涂鸦等。该程序充分利用iOS 6新技术的优势,提供其他记笔记或绘图应用程序所没有的体验。改变一切的应用程序简言之,目前没有哪个书写应用程序能够达到绘图记事本所提供的定制化水平。从记事本颜色及其页面,到应用程序本身的背景和外观,一切皆可改变。超过20种不同的纸张,15种记事本颜色,5个应用程序主题,您可以让一切如您所愿。混搭您在记事本中创建的每一页都可以设置为不同的纸张样式。这意味着,第一页您可以使用绘图纸,下一页使用横格纸。借助蓝图、待办事项列表、规划器、故事板等,您可以通过类似应用程序无法企及的一种方式管理您的项目。有用的工具可以为您的笔选择20种鲜艳的颜色和6个不同的粗细。用手指捏合放大可更好地进行控制和查看细节。照片可以调整大小、旋转以及添加到您认为合适的画布(可在应用程序内解锁)。您不是个涂鸦好手?我们也不是!使用我们独特的绘图工具复制和跟踪任何图像。简单而不失功能绘图记事本设计美观。界面干净直观,菜单便捷,易于操作。内置帮助使程序简单易学。高级功能我们设计的绘图记事本整合利用了当今最新的技术。可直接从应用程序使用Twitter、电子邮件和AirPrint。用手指滑动屏幕,就像iBooks那样浏览页面。分享按下一个按钮可导出整个记事本或单独页面。您创建的记事本可以直接从您的设备打印、作为PDF文件邮寄,或导出到第三方应用程序,如Dropbox或GoodReader。使用内置的Twitter客户端,与您的追随者分享您最喜爱的页面。通用的应用程序绘图记事本专业版是通用的应用程序,让您以1个程序的价格获得2个应用程序。拥有iPhone?iPad?iPod Touch?没关系。绘图记事本全都适用。绘图记事本专业版提供与众不同的体验和功能,儿童也能轻松使用,而且环保,仅限品行良好的人拥有,5个疯狂的科学家中有4个推荐使用。现在就试试绘图记事本吧!

author: kicker online - Olympia Verlag GmbH
desc: Willkommen in der neuen Lesewelt von kicker-sportmagazin. Ab sofort nimmt kicker-sportmagazin auch auf iPhone und iPad einen Spitzenplatz ein. Im kicker eMagazine finden Sie ab sofort alle Veröffentlichungen des kicker-sportmagazin kompakt und übersichtlich in einer App. Neben der Pflichtlektüre jedes Fußball-Fan, kicker am Montag und am Donnerstag, erscheinen im kicker eMagazine ebenso alle Sonderhefte wie zum Beispiel das kultige Bundesliga-Sonderheft oder das Champions-League-Sonderheft. Auch die hochwertigen kicker-Editionen finden Sie selbstverständlich in der neuen kicker eMagazine-App. Erleben Sie die Inhalte der kicker-Print-Ausgaben auf Ihrem iPhone und iPad in einem völlig neuen Glanz. Alle kicker-Ausgaben werden speziell für die Retina-Displays aufbereitet und garantieren Ihnen somit höchstes Lesevergnügen. Auch wenn sich das Spielfeld verändert – die kicker-Qualitäten bleiben gewohnt stark. Reportagen, Hintergründe und Interviews bieten tiefe Einblicke in Deutschlands Fußball-Szene. Dazu finden Sie natürlich weiterhin alle Statistiken, Tabellen und Spieler-Noten in Ihrem kicker. Ihre Vorteile des kicker eMagazine auf einen Blick: Lesen Sie vor allen Anderen – Montags- und Donnerstags-kicker stehen Ihnen jeweils bereits am Vortag um 22.30 Uhr zur Verfügung. Alle Ausgaben bequem und zentral auf Ihrem Gerät. Laden Sie Ihre Ausgabe herunter und greifen Sie überall auch ohne Online-Verbindung darauf zu. Einmal bereits gekaufte Ausgaben können Sie jederzeit wieder herunterladen. Abonnieren Sie kicker-Montag und - Donnerstag bequem mit Ihrem iTunes-Account: - 12 Monate für 149,99 € Das Abonnement verlängert sich um weitere 12 Monate, sofern Sie dieses nicht 24 Stunden vor Ablauf kündigen. Im Falle einer Verlängerung erfolgt die Belastung ebenfalls innerhalb von 24 Stunden vor Ablauf des Abonnements über Ihren iTunes-Account. Abonnements können jederzeit in Ihren persönlichen Account-Einstellungen im AppStore eingesehen und verwaltet werden. kicker eMagazine – alle Veröffentlichungen des kicker-sportmagazin in nur einer App. Egal wo Sie sind, Ihr kicker steht Ihnen jederzeit zur Verfügung.
language: 丹麦文, 德文, 意大利文, 法文, 英文, 葡萄牙文
name: kicker eMagazine
require: 需要 iOS 4.3 或更高版本。与 iPhone、iPad、iPod touch 兼容。 此 App 已针对 iPhone 5 进行优化。

author: Egmont Tidskrifter AB
desc: Golf Digest är magasinet för den passionerade golfaren. I Golf Digest hittar du reportage om världens mest spännande banor, du läser intervjuer med de hetaste spelarna på världens alla tourer. Golf Digest berättar märkliga och roliga historier ur golfens förflutna. Dessutom bevakar tidningen allt som händer på utrustningssidan – du får tips om nya klubbor, bollar, bagar och allt annat som du behöver för en lyckad golfrunda.Du kan även prenumerera!Prenumerationen löper över 3 månader och kostar 169:- Kostnaden dras från ditt iTunes-konto, och prenumerationen förnyas automatiskt när tidsperioden är över, om du inte avslutar det 24 timmar före periodens utgång. It covers everything from inshore and offshore fishing for species like bass, cod, bream and sharks, to in-depth reviews on the latest boats, engines, electronics and fishing tackle. author: GRUPO V SL
desc: Con la aplicación de Tenis World podrás descargarte los números de la revista sobre tenis líder en el quiosco. Cada mes, lo mejor del circuito profesional, con el análisis de los torneos más relevantes y la evolución de los mejores tenistas del mundo. Una revista para disfrutar del tenis en estado puro. Si te gusta este deporte, Tenis World es tu revista. Compra un ejemplar por separado o suscríbete y conseguirás grandes descuentos para poder disfrutar de la revista desde tu iPad, simplemente descargando cada nuevo número en cuanto esté disponible en el quiosco. Disfruta de la revista con el mejor tenis como la encuentras en tu quiosco, pero con la comodidad de hacerlo desde tu tablet, a un precio muy atractivo y de forma instantánea. El tipo de suscripción es anual (11 números) y empieza con el último número disponible. El precio de un número individual es de 2,69€ El precio de la suscripción es: Anual: 19,99 € - El pago sera cargado a tu cuenta de iTunes cuando confirmes la compra. - Tu suscripción se renueva automáticamente a menos que la autorenovación sea deshabilitada al menos 24 horas antes del final del período de la suscripción en curso. - 24 horas antes del fin del período de vigencia de la suscripción se te cargará en tu cuenta la renovación por el mismo período, por la misma duración y a la tarifa vigente de suscripción para ese producto. - Tú mismo puedes gestionar tus suscripciones y deshabilitar la autorenovación yendo a la configuración personal de tu cuenta después de la compra. - No se permiten cancelaciones de suscripciones durante el período vigente de suscripción. Esto no afecta a tus derechos establecidos por la ley. - Cuando compres una suscripción no perderás ninguna parte sin usar del período de prueba gratuito, en caso de que éste haya sido ofrecido. - Podremos recoger información sobre el uso de esta aplicación, tanto si el uso es on-line como off-line. Para más información, por favor, entra y mira nuestra política de privacidad. Al comprar una suscripción o descargar una aplicación, confirmas que has leído y aceptado la política de privacidad y condiciones de uso de Grupo V. http://www.grupovmedia.com/docs/privacidad_de_la_app.html http://www.grupovmedia.com/docs/condiciones_de_uso_de_la_app.html

author: CondeNet
desc: Experience the excitement of tournament golf with Golf World on the go. Get the latest exclusive coverage of the week's biggest events from the best writers in golf in two engaging products:Golf World Preview: Timely, useful insight into the storylines for the coming weekend's tournaments.Golf World Monday: Inside-the-ropes perspective and analysis wrapping up weekend play. MAGAZINE FEATURESGolf World Preview is published Thursday morning and features stories and commentary about upcoming tournaments on the PGA Tour, LPGA, European Tour, Champions Tour and amateur scene.• Five things to watch for this weekend• Analysis of who's hot and who's not entering each event• Course information, tee times and TV coverage• Equipment preview—who's trying what• Roundtable video and audio chats with editors discussing the game's big stories Golf World Monday is published early Monday morning and gives an intelligent review of the past week in golf.• A weekly list of the "10 Things We're Talking About"• Senior writer Tim Rosaforte's inside look at the weekend's critical stories• A recap of each tournament—who won and how• An equipment column discussing the latest and greatest products in tour pro's bagsSubscription information: $0.99/monthSubscriptions will start from the most current eCommerce enabled issue going forward for one month from the date of purchase. Your subscription will automatically renew via your iTunes account 24-hours prior to the end of your subscription at the rate of $0.99 for one month. You can turn off the auto-renew feature up to 24-hours before the end of your subscription by going to your Account Settings after purchase. Subscriptions cannot be cancelled during the active subscription period.

By subscribing you'll never miss an issue, when new editions are released you will be notified via push notifications and it will be in your app ready for you to download to your Apple device. Your whole magazine library travels with you and you always have the latest issue even when you are far from home.Past, present and future issues are available from within the app. Future issues are also available through our auto renewing yearly subscription. Subscription Options30 day FREE trial with annual subscription. No charge during the trial period – cancel at any time.**BEST DEAL 6 Issues (1 Year) at $44.99**• Monthly subscription $7.49• Single issue purchase $8.49The subscription will include the current issue if you do not already own it and subsequently Published future issues. This subscription will automatically renew unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 -hours before the end of the current period, your account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period. The cost of the renewal will match the initial subscription price.You may turn off auto-renewing subscriptions by going to your user's Account Settings after Purchase. No cancellation of the current subscription is allowed during your active subscription period.

author: MagazineCloner.com Limited
desc: Il Tennis Italiano è la rivista leader del tennis in Italia. Fondata nell’agosto del 1929 è anche la più antica rivista di tennis del mondo. Un primato sancito dalla Wimbledon Library, la biblioteca dell’All England Lawn Tennis Club, dove è conservata e aggiornata la collezione completa del mensile edito dalla Edisport Editoriale S.p.A. Con una redazione appassionata e competente offre un panorama completo sul mondo del tennis, da quello professionistico dei grandi campioni e dei grandi tornei a quello nazionale e regionale.Con la sua trentennale esperienza nei test di racchette, corde e calzature (i primi risalgono al 1978) Il Tennis Italiano è il riferimento unico per il tennista alla ricerca dell’attrezzatura più evoluta e performante: tutte le più importanti novità del mercato vengono infatti provate da un team di esperti in laboratorio e sul campo. Tra i collaboratori i migliori maestri e coach che garantiscono analisi tecniche e approfondimenti didattici per migliorare il proprio gioco. Ricordiamo tra gli altri Riccardo Piatti e Massimo Sartori, coach rispettivamente di Ivan Ljubicic, già n.3 del mondo e di Andreas Seppi, n. 1 d’Italia. “Il Tennis Italiano” è un giornale fatto da gente che gioca a tennis, per gente che gioca.__________________________________L'applicazione è scaricabile gratuitamente e ciascun numero potrà essere acquistato all'interno di essa. All'interno dell'applicazione è possibile anche sottoscrivere abbonamenti. Gli abbonamenti disponibili sono: 6 mesi: £14.99/ US$ 20.99/ Euro €16.99 (6 numeri) 12 mesi: £28.99/ US$40.99 / Euro €32.99 (12 numeri) - L'abbonamento verrà automaticamente rinnovato a meno che non sia annullato a non oltre 24 ore dalla fine del periodo di validità. Nelle 24 ore precedenti la fine dell'abbonamento, vi sarà addebitato automaticamente l'importo di rinnovo per la stessa durata e alle condizioni economiche in vigore al momento. - E' possibile disabilitare il rinnovo automatico degli abbonamenti nelle impostazioni del vs account, tuttavia in questo modo non potrete annullare l'abbonamento in corso durante il periodo di validità. - L'importo del pagamento sarà addebitato sul vs account iTunes alla conferma dell'acquisto e ogni porzione inutilizzata di periodo di prova gratis verrà annullata al momento della sottoscrizione di un abbonamento alla stessa rivista. "Pacchetti numeri arretrati"/ Il credito per numeri arretrati può essere acquistato all'interno dell'app. Per usare i crediti acquistati, cliccare semplicemente sul prezzo del numero e scegliere di usare il credito disponibile.E' possibile entrare nell'applicazione come un utente registrato su Pocketmags. Questo protegge i vs numeri in caso di smarrimento del device e permette la lettura dei numeri acquistati su piattaforme multiple. Gli utenti Pocketmags esistenti possono recuperare i propri acquisti entrando con le proprie credenziali. Vi raccomandiamo di creare un account Pocketmags. Se non riuscite a crearlo dall'interno dell'app per cortesia andate su www.pocketmags.com/register.aspx e poi all'interno dell'app effettuate l'accesso con le credenziali appena create.Si raccomanda di caricare per la prima volta l'applicazione in un'area wi-fi in modo che tutti i dati del numero possano essere scaricati. See full road tests of current models and read Cycle World's award-winning feature stories. Cycle world has been showcasing the best of motorcycling for 50 years. Included in the app is Cycle World's Guide to Getting Started in Motorcycling - yours Free! Control your experience via quick and easy navigation from article to article, with all the great photos and rich media content you expect from the leading motorcycle media source.In this app you will find these features: • A free issue preview • Free Moto Intro 2012 and 2011• The ability to buy a single issue or subscribe annually • Supports both horizontal and landscape orientations • New high resolution image featuring Pinch & Zoom • Social sharing • Supports both iPad and iPhone• Complete cover-to-cover issue (including all ads) ***Enjoy a FREE issue preview. Go into the in-app store and download a FREE issue preview. If you like it, buy the full issue for US$4.99 or subscribe. How Subscriptions Work: You may purchase subscriptions to Cycle World Magazine through the in-app store. Payment will be charged to your iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase. Subscriptions available: - 1-month subscription for US$1.99, automatically renewed until canceled- 1-year subscription (12 issues) for US$11.99, automatically renewed until canceled AUTOMATIC RENEWAL FEATURE: Your subscription will automatically continue (another month for monthly subscribers, another year for annual subscribers) unless auto-renewal is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. Your credit card will automatically be charged for another subscription period at the current subscription price. You can manage your subscriptions and turn off auto-renewal by going to your iTunes Account Settings after purchase. Subscriptions cannot be canceled during the active subscription period. For more information, read our privacy policy and terms of use. http://www.bonniercorp.com/privacy_policy.html

(계정정보 설정 중 '구독 관리'에서 가능) - 정기 구독 기간 중에는 취소 및 환불이 불가능합니다. - F& 디지털 매거진은 현재 무료 체험구독을 제공 하지 않습니다. 나중에 이용자에게 무료 체험구독을 제공하게 될 경우, 이용자가 기간이 끝나지 않았음에도 고객이 유료 정기구독에 가입하는 경우에는 무료 체험 구독에 대한 혜택은 없어집니다. [정기구독 자동결제 안내] - 결제는 아이튠즈 계정으로 청구 되며, 청구 내역은 설정된 계정에서 아이튠즈 계정으로 청구 발송됩니다. - 사용자의 계정 설정에서 가입환경 설정을 변경하지 않는 한 만료일로 부터 24시간 이내에 해제 하지 않으면 모든 정기구독에 대한 항목을 자동 갱신되어 비용이 청구됩니다. [과월호 구입 안내] - 정기 구독 이전의 과월호는 구독이 불가능 하며, 개별 이슈로만 구입이 가능합니다. [중국 지역 문제] 현재 사용중인 Adobe 솔루션이 중국지역에서는 라이브러리 이슈 다운로드가 정상적으로 되지 않고 있습니다. 해당 지역 이용자께서는 저희에게 이메일로 연락 부탁 드립니다.

desc: 一本独特的豪华游艇设计杂志，曾荣获最高分辨率摄影大奖尽享完全免费的期刊《Navis 豪华游艇杂志》是一本独特的出版物，专为豪华游艇和船舶的设计而定制。它是一本高品质的游艇设计杂志。游艇社区能够在此找到游艇领域中最先进的设计方案和趋势，以及相关的活动和游艇文化生活方式。 * 每期刊物都展示世界上最先进的摩托游艇和风帆游艇。* 超高清图片分辨率，能够让您放大 200%，来仔细审视图片细节。没有任何其他杂志能够做到这一点。* 详尽的文章介绍技术、设计和内景。* 刊登游艇生活方式的文章。* 您的超级游艇旅行目的地。杂志口碑：- “这是迄今为止最好的游艇应用程序之一。作为一个游艇爱好者，我曾四处寻觅。而这款应用程序非常深入，并且很好地涵盖了船舶的各个方面”- “每一期中都有如此众多的精致选择。图片品质非常高超，您可以清楚地看到所有的细节。”- “这是迄今为止最好的游艇杂志”- “对于全世界的游艇爱好者来说，绝对是最佳的应用程序。强烈推荐”- “精美绝伦”《Navis 豪华游艇杂志》作为一本独特的游艇设计杂志从其他出版物中脱颖而出。它不同于《游艇杂志》、《国际船舶》、《起航杂志》、《船舶杂志》等其他信息类杂志，其内容更多是围绕收藏设计而出版的。下载免费的期刊，开始尽享豪华游艇的世界吧。请您在阅读完本杂志后，留下评级分数，并为其他读者提供点评。------我们的期刊订阅按下述程序进行： 下载应用程序是免费的，并将包括数本完全免费期刊。后续的期刊将按照双月刊出版，您可以在应用程序商店内购买，其售价为 4.99 美元。您也可以通过应用程序内商店，按年订阅《Navis 豪华游艇杂志》，其售价为 19.99 美元。您将通过 iTunes 账号确认支付购买。订阅将按照同样的价格和时段自动延续，除非您在当前时段结束前至少 24 小时内关闭自动延续功能。用户可以管理订阅，并于购买后前往用户账号设置中关闭自动延续功能。当前订阅期间，您无法取消任何订阅。用户选择订阅时，任何未曾使用的试用期将立即作废。

desc: All Animals is an inspiring call to action and a celebration of the creatures who share our world. Our in-depth reporting, compelling writing, and beautiful imagery highlight the bond between people and animals and tell the hopeful story of advocates working for change around the globe. As the signature magazine of The Humane Society of the United States, the nation's most effective animal protection organization, we believe in the power of the collective human spirit. Join our compassionate community of supporters by downloading our FREE app and sharing with friends and family our life-changing content, including:• fun, instructional pieces to help you make life better for your pets and welcome wildlife to your backyard• the best reporting and writing on the most challenging issues facing animals today • profiles of animals saved by our rescue and animal care teams• lifestyle and trend stories that inspire humane choices in the marketplace• slideshows, video, latest news feeds, and interactive graphics that bring to life our mission to celebrate animals and confront crueltyLearn more about The HSUS and our bimonthly magazine at humanesociety.org/allanimals.

author: Ros Media
desc: MOTO iClub to specjalnie przygotowany projekt na temat samochodów. Temat kochany przez miliony entuzjastów samochodowych na całym świecie. Obiekt marzeń i pożądania nastolatków. Pokażemy najlepsze i najszybsze samochody sportowe produkowane obecnie i w przeszłości, najciekawsze nowości z rynku motoryzacyjnego, od luksusowych i prestiżowych sedanów, do legendarnych zabytkowych samochodów, które tworzą historię motoryzacji.W każdym odcinku naszej serii przedstawimy samochody, poprzez artykuły, galerie zdjęć i profesjonalnie wykonane filmy przedstawiające fakty dotyczące prezentowanych aut.Pobierz naszą darmową aplikację, a następnie wybierz numer czasopisma, który chcesz zakupić.Dostępne subskrypcje:3-miesięczna subskrypcja dostępna za 5,99 $ przedłużająca się automatycznie aż do odwołania.- Prenumerata odnowi się automatycznie, chyba że anulowane jej nastąpi nie więcej niż 24 godziny przed końcem bieżącego aktywnego okresu subskrypcji.- Możesz wyłączyć automatyczne odnawianie subskrypcji poprzez ustawienia konta, jednak nie możesz anulować aktualnie zakupionej - aktywnej subskrypcji podczas jej trwania.
name: Moto iClub PL
require: 需要 iOS 6.0 或更高版本。与 iPhone、iPad、iPod touch 兼容。

author: magazinecloner.com NZ LP
desc: Aviator is an Australian aviation title covering General Aviation, Recreational, LSA, Ultralights, Rotary and Warbirds. Our team pride ourselves on being an inclusive title for the aviation community, covering all aspects of getting airborne and staying there. This exquisitely designed magazine is aimed both at those working in the industry and to ‘aspirational’ flyers. Humorous, sometimes controversial and certainly always lively, Aviator is packed with news, comment and world-leading images supplied by award-winning photographers.-------------------- Paid-for application downloads include one issue of the user’s choice. Further future issues and back issues can be purchased within the app. Subscriptions are also available within the application. A subscription will start from the next released issue. To use purchased credits, simply click on the issue price and select ‘use credit’. This allows you to purchase back issues at reduced prices. Users can register for/ login to a pocketmags account in-app. This will protect their issues in the case of a lost device and allow browsing of purchases on multiple platforms. Existing pocketmags users can retrieve their purchases by logging into their account. We recommend loading the app for the first time in a wi-fi area so that all issue data is retrieved. author: Factory Media Limited
desc: Das Monster Skateboard Magazine ist Europas dienstälteste Skateboardpublikation (1982 gegründet) und zeigt monatlich, was in Sachen Deutsches Skateboarding angesagt ist – neben dem Besten aus der weltweiten Skateboardszene. Von Top-Interviews und authentischen Tour-Artikeln zu unerwarteten Features, Künstler-Portfolios und tiefgehenden Profiles – das MSM hat die Messlatte für Europa schon immer hoch gelegt. Endlich ein App um deine Lieblingsausgabe des SKATEBOARD MSM Magazins zu sehen. Durch den Kauf der App erhältst du automatisch kostenlos die aktuellste Ausgabe. Danach wirst du über jede neue Ausgabe informiert, die wiederum aus der App heraus erworben werden kann. Dies gilt natürlich auch für zurückliegende Ausgaben. Und mit unserer Abooption bekommst du zukünftige Ausgaben sogar zu einem noch günstigeren Preis! Durch interaktives Blättern, bei dem die Seiten deinen Fingern folgen und einer zusätzlichen Zoom-Funktion, werden die Probleme bezwungen, die jedem digitalem Ausgabegerät innewohnen. Ein einzigartiges Feature erlaubt es dir außerdem Magazine mit Freunden zu teilen - genauso, wie es in der realen Welt funktioniert. Zusätzlich hast du Zugang zu Bookmarks, der Inhaltsseite und einer großartigen Suchfunktion, die dir nicht nur erlaubt im aktuellen Magazin zu suchen, sondern auch in deinen Back-Issues. Ein Pixelmag can überall gelesen werden, völlig unabhängig von einer Datenverbindung. Dies ist essentiell, wenn du auf Reisen bist und du ein Magazin im Flugzeug oder im Zug lesen möchtest. Um das Magazin lesen zu können ist ein Pixel Mags Account notwending. Du kannst dich sowohl von der App direkt einloggen, als auch einen neuen Account erstellen. Und brauchst keinerlei Befürchtungen zu haben, dass du deine Magazine einmal verlierst, da sie immer wieder über deinen Account erhältlich sind. *Back issues and future issues are available for purchase within the App. Future issues are also available through the following auto-renewing subscription(s): -12 Issues (1 Year) at £22.99 / $32.99 / €25.99 -6 Issues (6 Months) at £10.99 / $15.99 / €12.99 The subscription will include the current issue if you do not already own it and subsequently published future issues. Payment will be charged to your iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase. This subscription will automatically renew unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period, your account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period. The cost of the renewal will match the initial subscription price. You may turn off auto-renewing subscriptions by going to your user’s Account Settings after purchase. No cancellation of the current subscription is allowed during your active subscription period. Please find our Terms and Conditions and Privacy Policy here: http://www.pixelmags.com/t+c/current/
language: 俄文, 日文, 英文, 荷兰文

It offers news, values for new releases as well as past sets along with the latest collecting trends.Our readers use this magazine to find out what's new, what their cards are worth, who's hot, who's not and more. For veterans and novices, Beckett Basketball is a must-have resource to stay informed and aware of the hobby.What to expect in each issue:• Editorial coverage: A mix of news, features and opinion pieces covering what’s new and what’s interesting in the hobby along with insight on how and what to collect.• Previews: All you need to know about upcoming card sets.• Reviews: Breakdowns  and opinions of the newest card releases.• The Hot List: A visual list and values for the 20 hottest cards on the market.• The Price Guide: More than 200 pages filled with price ranges for new releases and past sets.• Market Watch: A look at the key players and products to collect.---------------------------------This is a free app download. author: Leserauskunft GmbH
desc: aktiv Radfahren ist eines der beliebtesten Magazine für Genussradler und Marktführer bei Freizeitradlern und Radreisefreunden. aktiv Radfahren erscheint mit 8 Ausgaben im Jahr sowie mehreren Sonderheften. Das epaper bietet ausführliche Tests zu allen Fahrradklassen sowie praktische Kaufberatung zu Fahrrädern, Radzubehör sowie Rad- und Outdoorbekleidung. Außerdem gibt es Reportagen und Neuigkeiten rund ums Rad sowie praktische Serviceteile zu Technik, Gesundheit und Ernährung. Der großzügige Reiseteil führt Sie zu den schönsten Reisezielen für Radfahrer. Radeln Sie los – mit dem epaper von aktiv Radfahren. Einzel-epaperEinzelne epaper erhalten Sie im PDF-Format für 3,59 EUR pro Ausgabe. aktiv Radfahren - epaper erscheint monatlich mit 8 Ausgaben im Jahr. AbonnementProfitieren Sie von unseren günstigen Abo-Angeboten:6-Monats-Abo für 13,99 EUR12-Monats-Abo für 27,99 EURHinweise zum Abonnement: Sobald Sie Ihr Abonnement bestätigt haben, wird der entsprechende Betrag über Ihr iTunes-Konto eingezogen. Ihr Abonnement läuft automatisch über den von Ihnen gewählten Zeitraum weiter. Dies können Sie jederzeit bis 24 Stunden vor Ablauf ausschalten: - Klicken Sie dafür auf „Einstellungen“ und anschließend im Menü links auf „Store“ - Tippen Sie dann den Button „Apple ID“ an, danach auf „Apple ID anzeigen“ - Im Fenster „Abos verwalten“ lässt sich die automatische Verlängerung einfach deaktivieren. Schreiben Sie uns Ihre Meinung. Oder haben Sie Fragen? Unser Kundenservice hilft Ihnen immer gerne weiter: infoservice@pressekatalog.de Datenschutzerklärung: http://www.pressekatalog.de/PK/allgemein.asp?Side=dschutz

author: YUDU Ltd
desc: Introducing our NEW CANOEROOTS iPad, iPhone and iPod Touch app, which delivers the very best canoeing and camping stories and photography of CANOEROOTS magazine’s print edition, plus exclusive digital extras like videos, photo galleries, and digital enhancements like links to other articles and more information. Download the free Canoeroots Magazine app then follow the prompts to buy the latest issue, back issues or subscribe for the next 4 or 8 issues. You can also view the entire Spring 2011 issue of CANOEROOTS Magazine for FREE.CANOEROOTS, is the world’s best canoeing and camping magazine, published in the heart of canoe country and celebrating the tradition and heritage of canoeing with the adventure and soul of today’s canoeists. Our buyer’s guide is the number-one for new canoes, let us help you plan your next canoe trip and you can trust our news, techniques, gear and tips. And now you can get CANOEROOTS Magazine on your iPad, iPhone and iPod Touch.App Features:• Read the world’s best canoeing and camping magazine anywhere.• Enjoy a FREE issue of CANOEROOTS Spring 2011.• Get everything in the print editions plus: Digital extras like videos, photo galleries, audio interviews and links.• Buy new and back issues through this app using your Apple iTunes account; no need to manage a new account.• Subscribe for 12 or 24 months with push notification alerting you when a new issue is posted.• Browse the My Editions screen to view all available issues (we’re working on getting 24 back issues in the app, as far back as 2002), view your downloaded issues, and to download new issues. • Tap to open an issue, flip through pages with a swipe, tap to zoom for fun and easy reading.• Enjoy the new Navigation Scrolling Bar allowing you to quickly find your favorite part of each issue.• Read anywhere, anytime. You don’t need to have an Internet connection once you’ve downloaded an issue.• Our new in-app browsing allows you to follow links for more information right inside the Rapid Magazine app.• Tap the video icon to watch videos in each edition. Swipe through the videos view, and tap to play them. Rotate to your preference. Tap for full screening viewing.• You own the editions, they live on your iPad, iPhone or iPod Touch. Never lose an issue again.• Built-in help feature, but our app is so simple we don’t think you’ll need it.About Rapid Media:For 14 years, Rapid Media's leading paddling and kayak fishing magazines have made it one of the most recognized paddlesports media brands in the world. RAPID, ADVENTURE KAYAK, CANOEROOTS and KAYAK ANGLER magazines breed excitement and incite passion in both new and committed paddlers and anglers—and we were the first in iTunes. Read them all on your iPad, iPhone and iPod Touch anywhere in the world. Search by magazine name in the App Store today!Subscription Information CANOEROOTS – 1-Year Subscription $9.99 Buy individual editions for $2.99Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, and identify the cost of the renewal Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user’s Account Settings after purchase No cancellation of the current subscription is allowed during active subscription period Privacy Policy URL https://www.rapidmedia.com/privacy-policy

author: MagazineCloner.com Limited
desc: Armi e Tiro è nata nel 1988. Il cuore della rivista è rappresentato dalle prove di armi (sportive, da difesa, da caccia e da collezione) e di munizioni, con dati sulla ricarica. Le armi sono provate e testate con sofisticata strumentazione e corredate dalle impressioni di tester qualificati. Gli speciali offrono panoramiche del mercato. Anche tutto ciò che riguarda l’abbigliamento e gli accessori viene presentato ogni mese con articoli-novità. Poi reportage di caccia in tutto il mondo e l’aggiornamento delle discipline sportive del tiro. Listino prezzi con le caratteristiche dei singoli prodotti. Armi e Tiro è lo strumento più rappresentativo del mercato italiano delle armi e indicatore preciso e autorevole delle tendenze del settore, anche per l’estero.L'applicazione è scaricabile gratuitamente e ciascun numero potrà essere acquistato all'interno di essa. All'interno dell'applicazione è possibile anche sottoscrivere abbonamenti. Gli abbonamenti disponibili sono: 6 mesi: £14.99/ US$ 20.99/ €16.99 (6 numeri) 12 mesi: £28.99/ US$ 40.99/ €32.99 (12 numeri) - L'abbonamento verrà automaticamente rinnovato a meno che non sia annullato a non oltre 24 ore dalla fine del periodo di validità. Nelle 24 ore precedenti la fine dell'abbonamento, vi sarà addebitato automaticamente l'importo di rinnovo per la stessa durata e alle condizioni economiche in vigore al momento. - E' possibile disabilitare il rinnovo automatico degli abbonamenti nelle impostazioni del vs account, tuttavia in questo modo non potrete annullare l'abbonamento in corso durante il periodo di validità. - L'importo del pagamento sarà addebitato sul vs account iTunes alla conferma dell'acquisto e ogni porzione inutilizzata di periodo di prova gratis verrà annullata al momento della sottoscrizione di un abbonamento alla stessa rivista. "Pacchetti numeri arretrati"/ Il credito per numeri arretrati può essere acquistato all'interno dell'app. Per usare i crediti acquistati, cliccare semplicemente sul prezzo del numero e scegliere di usare il credito disponibile.E' possibile entrare nell'applicazione come un utente registrato su Pocketmags. Questo protegge i vs numeri in caso di smarrimento del device e permette la lettura dei numeri acquistati su piattaforme multiple. Gli utenti Pocketmags esistenti possono recuperare i propri acquisti entrando con le proprie credenziali. Vi raccomandiamo di creare un account Pocketmags. Se non riuscite a crearlo dall'interno dell'app per cortesia andate su www.pocketmags.com/register.aspx e poi all'interno dell'app effettuate l'accesso con le credenziali appena create.Si raccomanda di caricare per la prima volta l'applicazione in un'area wi-fi in modo che tutti i dati del numero possano essere scaricati. Se l'applicazione non parte dopo la pagina iniziale in seguito alla prima installazione o a un aggiornamento, si consiglia di cancellare e reinstallare l'applicazione dall'App Store. Per Aiuto e Domande Frequenti all'interno dell'app, cliccate sul bottone con il punto di domanda sulla schermata principale dell'app.Per assistenza su qualsiasi argomento, per cortesia scrivete a help@pocketmags.com indicando il nome del vs account e allegando la ricevuta dell'eventuale acquisto.

author: MagazineCloner.com Limited
desc: Motoron Dergisi sizler için yine bir ilke imza attı ve ilk kez çıkılan bir pistte, Abu Dhabi’deki Yas Marina Pisti’nde Ducati Panigale 1199’u test etti. Ducati’nin tasarım ve teknoloji sınırlarını aşan yeni yüzünü ve gücünü görmek için Mart sayısını kaçırmayın… RKS Titanic 150 ve Kuba Kee 100; siz oyunuzu hangisine kullanırsınız? İkisi de oldukça ekonomik ve sanıldığından çok daha performanslı, karar vermek için Mart sayısına bir göz atın…Farkı ayrıntılarda gizli! İlk kez Motoron Dergisi tarafından test edilen Yamaha’nın 100 cc’lik bu yeni scooter’ı Cygnus L, motosiklet kullanmayanları bile cezbedecek gibi gözüküyor… Her yönüyle birbirinden farklı iki motosikletin buluştuğu ortak nokta sizce ne olabilir? Evet Husqvarna Nuda 900 ve Triumph Tiger 800’den bahsediyoruz ve tahminleri size bırakıyoruz. Yine de Mart sayısına göz atmayı unutmayın, bakalım tahminleriniz ne kadar doğru…530 cc’lik bir maxi scooter… Size gerçek bir yol motoru hissini verecek olan Yamaha T-Max’in konforlu, dengeli ve güvenli sürüşü sizi gerçekten şaşırtacak.----------------------Ödeme yapılarak indirilmiş aplikasyonlara okuyucunun seçtiği bir sayı dahildir. Aplikasyonla gelecek ve geçmiş tarihli daha fazla sayı satın alınabilir.Aplikasyonda abonelikler de mümkün. Her abonelik, sıradaki yayınlanacak sayıyla başlar. Mümkün olan abonelikler: 6 geçmiş sayı paketi: £6.99/ US$9.99 / €7.996 aylık: £6.99/ US$9.99 / €7.99 (6 issues)12 aylık: £13.99/ US$19.99/ €14.99 (12 issues)Abonelik, süresi bitmeden 24 saat önceye kadar iptal edilmezse yenilenecektir. Mevcut abonelik süresinin bitmini takip eden 24 saat içinde, daha once abone olduğunuz sure ve mevcut fiyat şartlarıyla yeni abonelik bedeliniz tahsil edilecektir.  Hesap Ayarlarınıza girerek aboneliklerinizin otomatik yenileme özelliğini kaldırabilirsiniz; ancak mevcut aboneliğinizi aktif olduğu süre zarfında iptal edemezsiniz. Satın aldığınızı onayladığınız taktirde ödeme iTunes hesabınız üzerinden alınacak ve sunulmuş olsa dahi kullanılmayan bedava deneme süresi hakları, o yayın için abonelik satın alındığında kaybedilecektir. Aplikasyon aracılığıyla tek tak sayılar satın almak da mümkündür. Satın alınan kredilerin kullanılması için  sayının fiyatına tıklayıp “kredi kullan”I seçmeniz yeterlidir. Bu özellik, eski sayıları düşük fiyata satın alabilmenizi sağlar. Kullanıcılar aplikasyon dahilinde bir pocketmags hesabına üye olabilir veya giriş yapabilirler. Bu, cihazlarını kaybermeleri durumunda gzllüklerini koruyacak ve satın aldıkları abonelikleri farklı platformlarda izleyebilmelerini sağlayacaktır. Mevcut pocketmags kullanıcıları satın aldıkları abonelikleri, hesaplarına girerek izleyebilirler. Aplikasyonu ilk olarak bir kablosuz ağa bağlıyken yüklemenizi öneriyoruz; böylece tüm veriler indirilebilecektir. Aplikasyonunuz ilk yüklemenin veya bir güncellemenin ardından düzgün çalışmazsa lütfen silin ve App Store’dan yeniden yükleyin. Aplikasyon içinden ve pocketmags’den yardım ve sık sorulan sorulara ulaşabilirsiniz. author: GRUPO V SL
desc: Con la aplicación de Futbolista podrás descargarte los números de la revista sobre fútbol líder en España. Los mejores reportajes centrandose en los equipos y jugadores de la Liga, pero también el fútbol europeo: la Champions League, la Premier, el Calcio o la Bundesliga. Si te gusta el fútbol tu revista es Futbolista.Compra un ejemplar por separado o suscríbete y conseguirás grandes descuentos para poder disfrutar de la revista desde tu iPad, simplemente descargando cada nuevo número en cuanto esté disponible en el quiosco. Disfruta de la revista con las últimas novedades en gadgets como la encuentras en tu quiosco, pero con la comodidad de hacerlo desde tu tablet, a un precio muy atractivo y de forma instantánea.Elige tu opción de suscripción preferida, ahórrate el máximo con la oferta de suscrición anual. Los diferentes tipos de suscripción son: 1 mes, trimestral, semestral y anual y empiezan con el último número disponible.El precio de un número individual es de 1.79 €Los precios de las suscripciones son:1 mes: 1.79 €Trimestral: 4,49 € Semestral: 8,99 € Anual: 16,99 €- El pago sera cargado a tu cuenta de iTunes cuando confirmes la compra.- Tu suscripción se renueva automáticamente a menos que la autorenovación sea deshabilitada al menos 24 horas antes del final del período de la suscripción en curso.- 24 horas antes del fin del período de vigencia de la suscripción se te cargará en tu cuenta la renovación por el mismo período, por la misma duración y a la tarifa vigente de suscripción para ese producto.- Tú mismo puedes gestionar tus suscripciones y deshabilitar la autorenovación yendo a la configuración personal de tu cuenta después de la compra.- No se permiten cancelaciones de suscripciones durante el período vigente de suscripción. Esto no afecta a tus derechos establecidos por la ley.- Cuando compres una suscripción no perderás ninguna parte sin usar del período de prueba gratuito, en caso de que éste haya sido ofrecido.- Podremos recoger información sobre el uso de esta aplicación, tanto si el uso es on-line como off-line. Para  más información, por favor, entra y mira nuestra política de privacidad.Al comprar una suscripción o descargar una aplicación, confirmas que has leído y aceptado la política de privacidad y condiciones de uso de Grupo V.http://www.grupovmedia.com/docs/privacidad_de_la_app.htmlhttp://www.grupovmedia.com/docs/condiciones_de_uso_de_la_app.html

author: atlas Verlag GmbH
desc: Neues Update: Jetzt mit kostenlosem Zugang für Print-Abonnenten.Lesen Sie GOLF JOURNAL - die große deutsche Golfzeitschrift- bequem auf ihrem iPad oder iPhone.Laden Sie die kostenlose App und Sie können sich auf den ersten Seiten einen Überblick über die aktuelle GOLF JOURNAL Ausgabe verschaffen. Danach können Sie GOLF JOURNAL entweder als Einzelkauf erwerben - oder Sie schließen ein Abonnement Ihrer Wahl ab. Wenn Sie sich entscheiden die Ausgabe zu kaufen, können Sie natürlich jede Ausgabe vollständig herunterladen und archivieren. Einmal geladene Ausgaben stehen Ihnen immer zur Verfügung.So haben Sie immer Zugriff auf unsere ausführlichen Reiseberichte und Platzempfehlungen. Sie verpassen keinen der zahlreichen Trainingtipps und sämtliche Schlägertests stehen Ihnen auch Monate später noch auf ihren iOS Geräten zur Verfügung.Sie können mit der App einzelne GOLF JOURNAL Ausgaben für 4,49 € kaufen.Das 6 Monats-Abo (6 Ausgaben) kostet 21,99 € und das 12 Monats-Abo (12 Ausgaben) 43,99 €. Sie sparen damit über 30 % gegenüber dem regulären Abopreis!Anmerkung: Diese App ist für alle gedacht, die GOLF JOURNAL lieber auf dem  iPad/iPhone lesen und dabei Geld sparen wollen. Wir werden diese App und die Interaktivität kontinuierlich verbessern. Natürlich freuen wir uns auch über positive Rezensionen im iTunes Store. Wenn Sie Verbesserungsvorschläge haben, dann wenden Sie sich bitte via ipad@golfjournal.de direkt an uns.Das Abonnement verlängert sich automatisch, wenn Sie das automatische Verlängern nicht mindestens 24 Stunden vor Ablauf des Abos ausschalten. Unsere Privacy Policy finden Sie unter: http://www.3d-zeitschrift.de/lp/9764_1974299437/Privacy_policy.html

author: THE MAINICHI NEWSPAPERS
desc: 「毎日スポニチTAP-i」は、最大２カ月無料試し読みキャンペーン中です。初めての方が対象で、アプリを開いて「購読／試読」ボタンをタップしてください。無料試し読み期間は１カ月ですが、マーケティングに協力していただける方（メールアドレス、名前、郵便番号を共有）は、さらに１カ月の無料試し読み期間がプラスされます。「毎日スポニチTAP-i」は、毎日新聞社とスポーツニッポン新聞社が共同で発行する、iPadとiPhone(iPhone 4以上推奨)などが対象の日刊の新ニュース媒体です。発行は毎日午前3時から午前5時の間です。政治、経済などの硬いニュースはもちろん、社会、スポーツ、芸能ニュースも充実。記事が中心の紙媒体と違って、写真や動画でもニュースを伝えます。写真や図をタップすると、さまざまなアクションが起こって、より深くニュースを理解することができます。写真でその日のニュースをざっと理解し、より深く知りたい時は記事を読みます。そんな使い方ができるTAP-iは、これまでにない「ニュースにさわる」新媒体です。◆アプリのダウンロードと値段アプリは無料です。アプリ起動するとストア画面が現れ、通常号を1号100円でApple IDを使って買うことができます。また、1カ月(30日)の定期購読は900円です（注：AppStoreが設定する価格がドル建てのため、為替の影響でAppleが突然、日本円での価格を変更する事があります）。定期購読にはお試し期間があります。この期間が切れる24時間前までに購読停止すれば、有料の定期購読にはなりません。1カ月間の定期購読は、途中キャンセルによる購読料の払い戻しはできませんのでご注意ください。定期購読は自動更新されます。購読停止は期限が切れる24時間前までに行って下さい。◆購読の停止(iOS 6の場合）購読停止はiOSの「設定→iTunes Store/App Store→Apple ID」で表示される「Apple IDを表示」のポップアップで、Apple IDのパスワードを入力。現れたポップアップのなかから「購読」の「管理」ボタンをタップして下さい。さらに現れた画面で「TAP-i」の「有効」をタップして自動更新をオフにすればできます。◆ダウンロード環境 Wi-Fi環境での利用を推奨します。初回起動時、ストアに各号が表示されるまで少し時間がかかることがあります。◆バックナンバーの削除【iPad】「ストア＆書棚」画面で「歯車マーク」をタップ。「iPadから雑誌号を削除」を選んで下さい（一度購入した号は再ダウンロード可能です）。【iPhone】「ストア＆書棚」の「表示」ボタンをスワイプすると、「表示」が「削除」ボタンに替わりますので、タップします（iPad同様に購入号は再ダウンロードできます）◆「TAP-i by 毎日新聞+スポニチ」総合サイトhttp://www.mainichi.co.jp/tap-i/詳しくは、上記の総合サイトをご覧下さい。
name: 毎日スポニチTAP-i
require: 需要 iOS 6.0 或更高版本。与 iPhone、iPad、iPod touch 兼容。 此 App 已针对 iPhone 5 进行优化。

author: magazinecloner.com NZ LP
desc: Fight Fight Magazine is Australia oldest and leading Boxing publication with over 20 years in the fight industry. Now featuring MMA and Kickboxing stories our new magazine showcases the best of Australian combat sports in an easy to read magazine digital magazine. Together with the majority of the top boxing and MMA writers in Australia writing for Fist Fight magazine, they provide the most up-to-date, comprehensive and illustrated analysis available covering not only professional boxing but also its increasingly complicated political workings. In doing so, they produce a magazine that is informative, interesting, educational and at the same time entertaining - in short a truly indispensable regular companion to all fans’ enjoyment of the sport. The magazine emphasis is on quality article writing throughout, giving an insight into the sport as a lively and informative read. --------------------------------- This is a free app download with paid content within. When a recurring subscription is purchased the latest issue will become available to download immediately. author: YUDU Ltd
desc: Introducing our NEW iPad, iPhone and iPod Touch app, which delivers the very best sea kayaking stories and photography of ADVENTURE KAYAKS’s print edition, plus exclusive digital extras like videos, photo galleries, and digital enhancements like links to other articles and more information. Download the free Adventure Kayak Magazine App then follow the prompts to buy the latest issue and back issues. You can also view the entire Summer 2010 issue of ADVENTURE KAYAK for FREE.ADVENTURE KAYAK is packed with smart, informative and action-packed paddling stories mixing human interest and the lifestyle that is kayaking’s massive appeal. Learn about new places to paddle and explore, get expert advice, and find trustworthy kayak and gear reviews. Our award winning writers file stories from exotic waterways around the world and from the coastlines and waterways you paddle. And now to you on your iPad, iPhone and iPod Touch.App Features:• Read the world’s best kayak touring magazine anywhere.• Enjoy a FREE issue of ADVENTURE KAYAK Summer 2010.• Get everything in the print editions plus: Digital extras like videos, photo galleries, audio interviews and links.• Buy new and back issues through this app using your Apple iTunes account; no need to manage a new account.• Browse the My Editions screen to view all available issues (we’re working on getting 24 back issues in the app, as far back as 2002), view your downloaded issues, and to download new issues. • Tap to open an issue, flip through pages with a swipe, tap to zoom for fun and easy reading.• Enjoy the new Navigation Scrolling Bar allowing you to quickly find your favorite part of each issue.• Read anywhere, anytime. You don’t need to have an Internet connection once you’ve downloaded an issue.• Our new in-app browsing allows you to follow links for more information right inside the Rapid Magazine app.• Tap the video icon to watch videos in each edition. Swipe through the videos view, and tap to play them. Rotate to your preference. Tap for full screening viewing.• You own the editions, they live on your iPad, iPhone or iPod Touch. Never lose an issue again.• Built-in help feature, but our app is so simple we don’t think you’ll need it.For 14 years, Rapid Media's leading paddling and kayak fishing magazines have made it one of the most recognized paddlesports media brands in the world. RAPID, ADVENTURE KAYAK, CANOEROOTS and KAYAK ANGLER magazines breed excitement and incite passion in both new and committed paddlers and anglers—and we were the first in iTunes. So now you can read them all on your iPad, iPhone and iPod Touch anywhere in the world. Search by magazine in the App Store today.Subscription Information ADVENTURE KAYAK – 1-Year Subscription $9.99 Buy individual editions for $2.99Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period, and identify the cost of the renewal Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user’s Account Settings after purchase No cancellation of the current subscription is allowed during active subscription period Privacy Policy URL https://www.rapidmedia.com/privacy-policy

author: Tianjin Zubunet Technology Co.,Ltd.
desc: 揭秘动物世界，精彩不止一面；解读造物奇迹，心动不止一刻。 每月一场动物狂欢，看“五大门派”——狂野派、尖叫派、鸡皮疙瘩派、美丽动人派、趣多多派分别为你呈现动物世界或野性十足、或令人称奇、或恐怖惊悚、或赏心悦目、或妙趣横生的一面； 每月一次实地考察，跟随知名野生动物摄影师、动物保护大使展开险象环生又趣味十足的动物探索； 每月一次现场PK，看猎豹与藏羚羊谁与争锋，看海豹与蜘蛛谁的生存智慧更胜一筹…… 更有可爱萌宠前来助阵，精彩故事、搞笑漫画享不停！关于本杂志订阅注意事项: 1、动物奇迹杂志为月刊,一个月一期 2、订阅杂志,您可以选择 .订阅三个月,价格2.99美元或18元人民币 .订阅六个月,价格5.99美元或40元人民币 .订阅1年, 价格11.99美元或78元人民币 订阅从下个月开始,本月杂志赠送 3、过刊价格为0.99美元或6元人民币 4、只需支付一次,您就可以在所有的iPad设备上获取已订阅或购买的杂志 5、当您确认购买时,你的iTunes账号将支付相应的费用 6、您的订阅将会自动的更新,除非您在本次订阅结束前24小时关闭自动更新 7、您可以在iPad上从您的iTunes账号设置处关闭订阅自动更新 8、您不能取消已支付的有效订阅时段 9、请阅读用户隐私政策和使用条款 http://www.zubunet.com/site/privacy.jsp

author: Flambe Studios LLC
desc: No.1 App Store 付费下载应用程式!  全世界都正在疯狂下载 PicPlayPost® 并发部作品至 Instagram, 包括星巴克美国总部, 美国 UFC 拳击协会, 综艺圈 A 咖名人, 时尚圈知名部落客, 知名健身教学部落客, 美食部落客, 教师及许多全世界拥有百万粉丝的 Instagrammers 最受欢迎的部落客!  PicPlayPost® 是一个简易上手的软体, 可将影片及照片混合编辑至不同的相框设计, 您可分享这不可思议的作品至社群网站给家人及朋友. 现在, 我们更针对最新苹果 iOS 7 软体设计, 及参考支持我们产品的粉丝建议, 推出最新程式更新, 目的将 PicPlayPost® app 功能提升至更高层境界, 欢迎下载 PicPlayPost®, 一起来加入我们这股影像编辑的新势力吧!◉ 最新功能 (装置必须更新至 iOS 7)    - 可编辑至 6 个影片, 让您可同时分享更多内容给家人及朋友     - 每部影片最长可达 10 分钟, 您将可以分享更长的 PicPlayPost™ 影片至 Youtube     - 全新音乐相片功能, 您可以轻松制作音乐卡片分享给家人及朋友     - 全新支援 GIF 输入图档功能 - 轻松选取您想使用的影片及背景音乐片段     - 改善使用者介面, 使程式更容易上手     - 新增常见问题解答单元, 99% 问题通常都在此 Q&A​​ 可找到解答     - 分享作品至脸书, 推特, Instagram, YouTube, Tumblr, 也可利用电子邮件或 MMS 简讯寄送给家人及朋友     - 并包括下列基本功能◉ 基本功能(适用于 iOS 6 以下之装置)    - 可加入 4 个影片编辑 (可达 30 秒)     ◎ 6 种相框比例设计     ◎ 36 个相框选择     ◎ 72 种背景图样选择     ◎ 8 种照片滤镜     ◎ 7 种影片滤镜     - 可调整音量及使用 iPod 音乐库做为背景音效     - 用心设计让您在小空间发挥最大创意     - 可在垂直或水平状态编辑让您能更有效率的利用画面空间     - 照片互换的功能更能让您简单的就能替换照片位置     - 加入旋转功能让您可直接在编辑照片或影片时做调整     - 可调整相框内圆角及边线设定     - 高画质照片输出     ◎ 3264x3264 (iPhone 5, 4S & iPad 3)     ◎ 2592x2592 (iPhone 4 & iPad 2)     ◎ 2048x2048 (iPhone 3GS, iPad 1, iPod Touch)     - 影片输出画质     ◎ 提供每秒 30 幅影片高清输出     ◎ 1280x1280 (1:1), 768x1152 (2:3), 960x1280 (3:4), 1280x720 (16:9). iPhone 5, 4S, iPad 2 and iPad 3     ◎ 960x960 (1:1), 640x960 (2:3), 720x960 (3:4), 1280x720 (16:9). iPhone 4     ◎ 512x512 (1:1), 420x630 (2:3), 480x640 (3:4), 640x360 (16:9). iPhone 3GS and iPad 1     - 可选择按序播放或同时播放影片     - 分享作品至脸书, 推特, Instagram, YouTube, 也可利用电子邮件或 MMS 简讯寄送给家人及朋友     - 可在 iPhone, iPad, 以及 iPod Touch 使用

Existing pocketmags users can retrieve their purchases by logging into their account. We recommend loading the app for the first time in a wi-fi area so that all issue data is retrieved. If your app will not load past the splash page after a first install or an update please delete and reinstall the app from the App Store Help and frequently asked questions be accessed in-app and on pocketmags. author: PageSuite
desc: AMAZONAS is one of the world’s legendary freshwater aquarium magazines, read by tens of thousands of tropical fish enthusiasts and now available for the first time in English.New species discoveries, awesome aquarium profiles, breeding breakthroughs, expeditions to wild tropical streams and lakes, hands-on advice and secrets to keeping a thriving, stunningly beautiful freshwater aquarium are the focus of every sumptuously printed issue.Written by experts and illustrated with breathtaking color images, AMAZONAS is a must read for the adventuresome freshwater aquarist—a constant source of new ideas, cutting edge information and inspiration. Discover the best-selling freshwater aquarium magazine in the English language, hailed for its brilliant photography and authoritative articles.MAGAZINE FEATURES: • Luminous color and crisp, highly readable text in a replica of the print edition that is read in more than 100 countries. • Hot links to great videos and information sources on tropical fishes,  aquatic plants, freshwater invertebrates, and the latest breeding breakthroughs, aquarium technology, supplies, and hard-to-find gear.EVERY ISSUE BRINGS:• Fish, Plant, and Invertebrate Species Profiles• New Species and Rarities• World-Class Aquarium Systems• Freshwater Aquarium Husbandry for Beginners to Experts• Tropical Travel & Underwater Exploration• Thought-Provoking News, Portraits, Interviews, Technology Updates, and much more.“A STUNNING APP!”• Text-formatted articles designed for maximum mobile readability.• Download each issue, then return any time for offline reading.• Search the archive of available issues.• Save your favorite content.• Share with the built in social networking facilites.• New issues will be available for download bimonthly.Amazonas provides availability to all editions of the magazine by incorporating subscriptions allowing the purchase of a yearly subscription to the magazine. This yearly subscriptions is an auto-renewing subscription. The subscription is $14.99 for a whole year. Payment for this subscription will be charged to your iTunes account upon purchase. The subscription will auto-renew within 24 hours of the current subscription expiring. Auto-renewing subscriptions can be managed via Account Settings allowing them to be turned off. No cancellations of the current subscription are allowed during the active subscription period. For any further information see http://subscriber.pagesuite-professional.co.uk/file/Website_Privacy_statement.doc
